data.translation: UDkt Ehud Ur, uprofesa wezokwelapha eDalhousie University eHalifax, eNova Scotia kanye nosihlalo womnyango wezokwelapha nowesayensi weCanadian Diabetes Association waxwayisa ngokuthi ucwaningo lusesezinsukwini zalo zokuqala.

data.translation: Njengabanye ochwepheshe, uyababuza ukuthi kungenzeka yini ukwelapha isifo sikashukela, eqaphela ukuthi lezi zithombe azisebenzi kubantu asebevele beneSimo sikashukela sohlobo 1.
data.original_reference: Njengezinye izazi, unokungabaza ngokuthi isifo sikashukela singalashwa, ephawula ukuthi lokhu okutholakele akubathinti abantu abanoHlobo ike some other experts, he lukashukela.

data.translation: NgoMsombuluko uSara Danius, ongunobhala ohlala njalo weKomiti Yobukhosi Yezincwadi eSweden Academy, wamemezela esidlangalaleni ngesikhathi esakaza umsakazo eSveriges Radio eSweden ukuthi ikomiti, engakwazi ukufinyelela uBob Dylan ngokuqondile mayelana nokuwina uMklomelo KaNobel Wezincwadi ka-2016, yayishiye imizamo yayo yokufinyelela kuye.
data.original_reference: NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala wesikhathi sonke weKomiti yeNobel yeZincwadi kuyi-Akhademi yase-Sweden, umemezele obala phakathi nohlelo lomsakazo eMsakazweni we-Sveriges e-Sweden ukuthi ikomiti, njengoba lingakwazi ukufinyelela uBob Dylan ngokuqondile ngokuwina Umklomelo weNobel weZincwadi, liyeke imizamo yokumfinyelela.
data.corrected_reference: NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala wesikhathi sonkeweKomidi leNobel for Literature eSwedish Academy, umemezele obala phakathi nohlelo lomsakazo eSveriges Radio eSweden ikomiti, njengoba lingakwazi ukufinyelela kuBob Dylan ngokuqondile mayelana nokunqoba Umklomelo weNobel weZincwadi ka-2016, liyeke imizamo yokumfinyelela.

data.translation: UDanius wathi, "Okwamanje asenzi lutho. Ngishayele ucingo ngathumela ama-imeyili kumuntu owayesebenza naye futhi ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungane kakhulu. Okwamanje, lokho kwanele."
data.original_reference: UDanius wathi, “Okwamanje asenzi lutho. Sengishayele ucingo ngaphinde ngathumela ama-imeyile kwabasondelene naye kakhulu asebenzisana nabo futhi ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungane. Okwamanje, lokho ngokuqinisekile kwanele.”
data.corrected_reference: UDanius wathi, “Okwamanje asenzi lutho. Sengishayele ucingo ngaphinde ngathumela ama-imeyile kwabasondelene naye kakhulu asebenzisana nabo futhi ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungane. Okwamanje, lokho ngokuqinisekile kwanele.”

data.translation: Enye i-antibody cocktail, i-ZMapp, ekuqaleni yayithembisa ensimini, kodwa izifundo ezisemthethweni zikhombisa ukuthi yayinenzuzo encane kunalokho eyayikufuna ekuvimbeleni ukufa.

data.translation: Esivivinyweni se- PALM, i- ZMapp yasebenza njengendlela yokulawula, okusho ukuthi ososayensi bayisebenzisa njengendlela yokusungula futhi baqhathanisa ezinye izindlela ezintathu zokwelapha nalo.

data.translation: I-USA Gymnastics isekela incwadi ye-United States Olympic Committee futhi yamukela isidingo esiphelele somndeni wama-Olympic sokukhuthaza indawo ephephile yabo bonke abasubathi bethu.
data.original_reference: Ukuzivocavoca Kokuqinisa Imisipha Namathambo kwaseMelika kusekela incwadi yeKomiti lama-Olimpiki laseMelika futhi kwamukela isidingo esiphelele sokuba umndeni wama-Olimpiki ukhathaze indawo ephephile yabadlali bethu bonke.
data.corrected_reference: I-USA Gymnastics isekela incwadi yeKomiti lama-Olimpiki laseMelika futhi kwamukela isidingo esiphelele sokuba umndeni wama-Olimpiki ukhathaze indawo ephephile yabadlali bethu bonke.

data.translation: Siyavumelana nesitatimende se-USOC sokuthi izithakazelo zezemidlalo yethu namaqembu, kanye nemidlalo yabo, zingase zikhonze kangcono ngokuqhubekela phambili noshintsho olunengqondo ngaphakathi kwenhlangano yethu, kunokuba kukhishwe isitifiketi.
data.original_reference: Sivumelana nokushiwo yi-USOC ukuthi izithakazelo zabadlali kanye namaqembu, kanye nemidlalo yabo, zingakhonzwa kangcono ngokuyaphambili ngoshintsho olunenjengo phakathi kwenhlangano yethu, kunokuthathelwa izitifiketi.
data.corrected_reference: Sivumelana nesitatimende se-USOC ukuthi izintshisekelo zabadlali kanye namaqembu, kanye nemidlalo yabo, zingakhonzwa kangcono ngokuyaphambili ngoshintsho olunenjongo phakathi kwenhlangano yethu, kunokuthathelwa izitifiketi.

data.translation: I-USA Gymnastics isekela uphenyo oluzimele olungase lukhanyisele ukuthi ukuhlukunyezwa kwesilinganiso esichazwe ngesibindi kangaka ngabasindile bakaLarry Nassar kwakungabonakali kanjani isikhathi eside kangaka futhi kuhlanganisa noma yiluphi ushintsho oludingekayo noludingekayo.
data.original_reference: I-USA Gymnastics isekela uphenyo oluzimele olungaveza ukukhanya endleleni ukuhlukumeza kobukhulu obuchazwe ngesibindi yilabo abasinde kuLarry Nassar obekungenzeka kungabonwa ngayo isikhathi eside kangaka futhi yamukela noma iziphi izinguquko ezidingekayo nezifanele.
data.corrected_reference: I-USA Gymnastics isekela uphenyo oluzimele olungaveza ukukhanya  ngokuhlukunyezwa kwenxenye echazwe ngesibindi yilabo abasinde kuLarry Nassar obekungenzeka kungabonwa ngayo isikhathi eside kangaka futhi yamukela noma iziphi izinguquko ezidingekayo nezifanele.

data.translation: I-USA Gymnastics ne-USOC banomgomo ofanayo ukwenza umdlalo we-gymnastics, kanye neminye, uphephe ngangokunokwenzeka ukuze abasubathi balandele amaphupho abo endaweni ephephile, enhle futhi enamandla.
data.original_reference: Ezokuzivivinya komzimba zaseMelika kanye ne-USOC zinomgomo ofanayao — ukwenza umdlalo wezokuzivivinya komzimba, kanye neminye, iphephe ngangokunokwenzeka ukuba abadlali balandele amaphupho wabo endaweni ephephile, enhle kanye nenika amandla.
data.corrected_reference: I-USA Gymnastic kanye ne-USOC zinomgomo ofanayao — ukwenza umdlalo wezokuzivivinya komzimba, kanye neminye, iphephe ngangokunokwenzeka ukuba abadlali balandele amaphupho wabo endaweni ephephile, enhle kanye nenika amandla.

data.translation: Phakathi nokukhethwa kuka-1976 weluleka uCarter ngezindaba zangaphandle, wabe eseba umeluleki wezokuphepha kazwelonke (i-NSA) kusukela ngo-1977 kuya ku-1981, eshintsha uHenry Kissinger.
data.original_reference: Phakathi nokhetho luka-1976 waluleka uCarter ngemithetho yakwamanye amazwe, bese wakhonza kuyiNational Security Advisor (NSA) kusuka ngo-1977 kuya ku-1981, ethatha isikhundla sikaHenry Kissinger.
data.corrected_reference: Phakathi nokhetho luka-1976 waluleka uCarter ngemithetho yakwamanye amazwe, bese wasesebenza njenge-National Security Advisor (NSA) kusuka ngo-1977 kuya ku-1981, ethatha isikhundla sikaHenry Kissinger.

data.translation: Njenge-NSA, wasiza uCarter ekuphatheni izindaba zomhlaba ngokombuso, njengezivumelwano zaseCamp David, 1978; ukujwayelekile kwezibopho zase-US China kwakubonakala ngasekupheleni kwawo-1970; iNqubuzulwano yase-Iran, eyaholela enkingeni yezisebenzi zase-Iran, 1979; nokuhlasela kweSoviet e-Afghanistan, 1979.
data.original_reference: Njenge-NSA, usize uKhatha ngokuphatha izindaba zezwe ngokuhlakanipha, njengeSivumelwano seKamu Davide, ngo-1978; ukwenza kube nobudlelwane obuvamile phakathi kweMelika neShayina ekupheleni kwawo-1970; Ushintsho lwase-Iran, olwaholela enhlekeleleni yezithunjwa zase-Iran, ngo-1979; kanye nokuhlasela kweSoviet e-Afghanistan, ngo-1979.
data.corrected_reference: Njenge-NSA, usize uCarter ngokuphatha izindaba zezwe ngokusemthethweni, njenge-Camp David Accords, 1978; ukwenza kube nobudlelwane obuvamile phakathi kweMelika neShayina ekupheleni kwawo-1970; Ushintsho lwase-Iran, olwaholela enhlekeleleni yezithunjwa zase-Iran, ngo-1979; kanye nokuhlasela kweSoviet e-Afghanistan, ngo-1979.

data.translation: Izingoma ezimbili zefilimu, i-Audition (The Fools Who Dream) neCity of Stars, zathola ukuqokwa kwezingoma ezinhle kakhulu. I-Lionsgate studio yathola ukuqokwa okungu-26 ngaphezu kwanoma iyiphi enye studio.
data.original_reference: Izingoma ezimbili ezivela kuyifilimu, Ukulalela (Iziphukuphuku Eziphuphayo) kanye neDolobha leziNkanyezi, zakhethwa ukuthi zithole umklomelo wengoma yangempela ehamba phambili. Isitshudiyo se-Lionsgate sikhethwe izikhathi ezingu-26 — ukudlula noma esiphi isitshudiyo.
data.corrected_reference: Izingoma ezimbili ezivela kwifilimu, i-Audition (The Fools Who Dream) kanye ne-City of Stars, zithole ukuqokelwa kwengoma yangempela ehamba phambili. Isitudiyo se-Lionsgate sikhethwe izikhathi ezingu-26 — ukudlula noma esiphi Isitudiyo.

data.translation: Lokhu akuqinisekisi nje kuphela ukuthi okungenani amanye ama-dinosaurs ayenamaphiko, okuyisimo esivele sisakazekile, kodwa kunikeza imininingwane amafosili ngokuvamile angakwazi ukuyenza, njengombala nokulungiswa kwemiklamo emithathu.

data.translation: Ngenxa yokuthi izimpaphe zezinambuzane azinawo umsele owakhiwe kahle, obizwa ngokuthi i- rachis, kodwa zineminye imiklamo yezinambuzane izimpaphe nezimpaphe abacwaningi baphetha ngokuthi i- rachis cishe yayithuthuka kamuva ngokuthuthuka kunezinye lezi miklamo.
data.original_reference: Ngenxa yokuthi izimpaphe zama-dinosaur aziso isiqu esikhule kahle, osibizwa ngokuthi i-rachis, kodwa zinezinye izici zezimpaphe — izindlendla kanye nama-barbule — abacwaningi baphethe ngokuthi i-rachis cishe bekungukwakheka kokuziphendukela kunalezinye izici.

data.translation: Bathola ukuthi ilanga lisebenza ngezimiso ezifanayo nezinye izinkanyezi: Umsebenzi wazo zonke izinkanyezi kule nqubo wabonakala ukuthi ulawulwa ukukhanya kwazo, ukujikeleza kwazo, futhi akukho okunye.

data.translation: UDuvall, oshadile onezingane ezimbili ezincane, akazange amenze umxhwele uMiller, okwakuxoxwa ngaye le ndaba.

data.translation: Lapho ebuzwa ukuthi aphawule, uMiller wathi, "UMike ukhuluma kakhulu ngesikhathi sokuzwa... Bengilungiselela ngakho angizwanga ngempela ayekusho."

data.translation: "Sizolwela ukunciphisa ukukhishwa kwe-carbon dioxide ngenye ye-GDP ngomkhawulo ophawulekayo ngo-2020 uma kuqhathaniswa nezinga lika-2005," kusho uHu.

data.translation: Umbiko uqala ngesicelo sokuxoxisana ngokuvulekile nokwakhiwa kokuvumelana e-United States mayelana nenqubomgomo eqondene ne-Middle East.

data.translation: Okokuqala phakathi kwezincomo zayo ezingu-78 ukuthi kusungulwe isinyathelo esisha sobudlelwane ngaphambi kokuphela konyaka ukuze kuvikelwe imingcele ye-Iraq ekungeneni kwezithakazelo ezonakele futhi kubuyiselwe ubudlelwane obudidekile nabomakhelwane bayo.
data.original_reference: Okokuqala phakathi kokutusa kwayo okungu-78 ukuthi isinyathelo sokuxhumana kumelwe sithathe ngaphambi kokuphela kwalonyaka ukuvikela imingcele yase-Iraq ekungeneleni konya kanye nasekumiseni kabusha ubuhlobo bokuxhumana nomakhelwane bayo.

data.translation: Usengamele futhi enguNkosikazi Oyinhloko yase-Argentina uCristina Fernandez de Kirchner umemezele ukuthi uzokhetho lwakhe njengomengameli izolo kusihlwa eLa Plata, idolobha eliqhele ngamakhilomitha angu-50 ukusuka eBuenos Aires.
data.original_reference: Ilungu lesigele lamanje kanye noNkosikazi kaMongameli wase-Argentina uCristina Fernandez de Kirchner umemezele ukungenela kwakhe ukhetho lokuba umongameli izolo ntambama eLa Plata, idolobha elingamakhilomitha angu-50 (amamayela angu-31) kusuka eBuenos Aires.
data.corrected_reference: Ilungu lesigele lamanje kanye noNkosikazi kaMongameli wase-Argentina uCristina Fernandez de Kirchner umemezele ukungenela kwakhe ukhetho lokuba umongameli izolo ntambama eLa Plata, idolobha elingamakhilomitha angu-50 (amamayela angu-31) kusuka eBuenos Aires.

data.translation: UNkk.Kirchner wamemezela inhloso yakhe yokuphikisana nomongameli eArgentine Theatre, indawo efanayo ayesebenzisa ukuqala ngayo umkhankaso wakhe we-2005 weSenate njengelungu leqembu lesifundazwe saseBuenos Aires.
data.original_reference: UNkk. Kirchner umemezelo inhloso yakhe yokukhankasela ukuba umongameli eThiyetheni yase-Ajenthina, indawo efanayo ayisebenzisele ukuqala umkhankaso wakhe wokuba ilunga leSigele njengelunga lamanxusa esifunda sase-Buenos Aires.

data.translation: Le mpikiswano yaqala ngenxa yokuphikisana ngemali esetshenziselwa ukusiza nokwakha kabusha ngemuva kweSiphepho uKatrina; abanye abagcini bemali baye babiza ngokuhlekisa ngokuthi "" iBush's New Orleans Deal. "
data.original_reference: Inkulumo-mpikiswano idalwe ukuphikisana ngokuchitha imali eningi yokusiza kanye nokwakha kabusha ngemva kokudlula kweSiphepho iKatrina; leyo abesikhwama sezwe abadla ngoludala abayibize sakudlala ngokuthi “Isivumelwano sikaHlathi sase-Orleans eNtsha.”
data.corrected_reference: Inkulumo-mpikiswano idalwe ukuphikisana ngokuchitha imali eningi yokusiza kanye nokwakha kabusha ngemva kokudlula kweSiphepho iKatrina; leyo abesikhwama sezwe abadla ngoludala abayibize sakudlala ngokuthi "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

data.translation: Izindinganiso zokuvukela ezishukumisayo emizamweni yokwakha kabusha zigxile ekunikezeni izinkontileka zokwakha kabusha kubantu ababonakala bevela ngaphakathi eWashington.

data.translation: URobin Uthappa wenza innings ephezulu kakhulu, amagoli angu-70 emibhalweni engu-41 kuphela ngokushaya ama-four 11 kanye nama-sixes amabili.

data.translation: Kodwa, ngemuva kokulahlekelwa yiketi likaputeni i-India yenza kuphela ama-run angama-36 ilahlekelwa ngamathikithi ayi-7 ukuqeda umdlandla.

data.translation: UMongameli wase-United States uGeorge W. Bush wafika eSingapore ekuseni ngoNovemba 16, eqala uhambo lwakhe lweviki lonke lokuvakashela e-Asia.
data.original_reference: UMongameli waseMelika uJoji W. Hlathi ufike eSingapho ekuseni ngoNovemba 16, eqalisa uhambo lwakhe lweviki lokuvakashela i-Asia.
data.corrected_reference: UMongameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush wafika eSingapore ekuseni ngoLwezi 16, eqalisa uhambo lwakhe lweviki lokuvakashela i-Asia.

data.translation: Wamukelwa yiSingapore Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng futhi waxoxa ngezindaba zokuhweba nezokuthuthuka kwezigameko kanye noNdunankulu waseSingapore uLee Hsien Loong.
data.original_reference: Wabingelelwa iPhini likaNdunankulu uWong Kan Seng futhi baxoxa ngezinkinga zezentengiselwano kanye nezokuvakasha kanye noNdunankulu waseSingapore uLee Hsien Loong.
data.corrected_reference: Wabingelelwa yiPhini likaNdunankulu wase-Singapore u-Wong Kan Seng futhi baxoxa ngezohwebo kanye nezokuvakasha noNdunankulu waseSingapore uLee Hsien Loong.

data.translation: Ngemva kwesonto elahlekile okhethweni lwesigamu, uBush wakhuluma nezethameli ngokwanda kwezohwebo e-Asia.
data.original_reference: Ngemva kweviki lokulahlekelwa okhethweni lwaphakathi nesikhathi, uBhush watshela izilaleli ngokukhulisa ezentengiselwano e-Asia.
data.corrected_reference: Ngemva kweviki lokulahlekelwa okhethweni lwaphakathi nesikhathi, uBush watshela izilaleli ngokukhulisa kokuhwebelana e-Asia.

data.translation: UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela uhulumeni 'Clean Air Act' ekomitini lamaqembu wonke ukuze abukeze, ngaphambi kokufundwa kwesibili, ngemuva komhlangano wemizuzu engama-25 ngoLwesibili nomholi we-NDP uJack Layton e-PMO.
data.original_reference: UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela 'Umthetho woMoya Ohlanzekile' ukuba uhlolwe ikomiti lamaqembu onke, ngaphambi kokuba ufundwe okwesibili, ngemva komhlangano wangoLwesibili wemizuzu engu-25 nomhloli weNDP uJack Layton kuyi-PMO.
data.corrected_reference: UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela uhulumeni 'Umthetho woMoya Ohlanzekile' ukuba uhlolwe ikomiti lamaqembu onke, ngaphambi kokuba ufundwe okwesibili, ngemva komhlangano wangoLwesibili wemizuzu engu-25 nomhloli weNDP uJack Layton kuyi-PMO.

data.translation: ULayton wayecele izinguquko kumthethosivivinywa wezokuphepha womphakathi wabogqugquzeli ngesikhathi ehlangana noNdunankulu, ecela "ukubhaliswa kabusha okuphelele" komthethosivivinywa wezokuphepha womphakathi weqembu labogqugquzeli.

data.translation: Kusukela uhulumeni wase-United States wangena ukuze athathe imali yesibhedlela saseMersey eDevonport, eTasmania, uhulumeni wesifundazwe kanye namalungu athile ephalamende lase-United States baye bagxeka lesi senzo njengento eyenziwa ngaphambi kokhetho lwe-United States oluzobanjwa ngoNovemba.
data.original_reference: Kusukela ngesikhathi Uhulumeni Wenhlangano Yamazwe ungenela ekuphatheni uxhaso lwesibhedlela i-Mersey eDevonport, eThasmaniya, uhulumeni wezwe kanye namanye amalungu kahulumeni wenhlangano yamazwe asola lesi senzo njengesandulela sokhetho lukahulumeni oluzokwenziwa ngoNovemba.

data.translation: Kodwa uNdunankulu uJohn Howard uthe lo mthetho wawuklanyelwe ukuvikela izakhiwo zesibhedlela ukuze zingahlaziywa uhulumeni waseTasmania, ngokunika u-AUD ongeza ku- $45 million.

data.translation: Ukuziphatha kwabo okushisayo akuzinzile njengemihume emikhulu eMhlabeni evame ukugcina izinga lokushisa eliqinile, kodwa kuyavumelana nokuthi lawa ngamabhodwe ajulile emhlabathini, "kusho uGlen Cushing we-United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team naseNyakatho Arizona University eseFlagstaff, e-Arizona.

data.translation: EFrance, ukuvota kuye kwaba yinto esezingeni eliphansi: abavoti bazihlukanisa esitokisini, bafake iphepha eliphrintiwe elibonisa umcimbi abawukhethile ebhulohweni.

data.translation: Owayengusihlalo weNdlu Yabahlali, uNewt Gingrich, umbusi waseTexas uRick Perry, kanye nowesifazane osebenza eCongress uMichele Bachmann bafika endaweni yesine, yesihlanu neyesi-6 ngokulandelana.
data.original_reference: Umkhulumeli Wendlu uNewt Gingrich, umbusi waseTexas uRick Perry, kanye nelungu lesishaya-mthetho lowesifazane uMichele Bachmann baqede endaweni yesine, yesihlanu, kanye neyesithupha, ngokulandelana.
data.corrected_reference: Umkhulumeli Wendlu uNewt Gingrich, umbusi waseTexas uRick Perry, kanye nelungu lesishaya-mthetho lowesifazane uMichele Bachmann baqede endaweni yesine, yesihlanu, kanye neyesithupha, ngokulandelana.

data.translation: Ngemva kokuthola imiphumela, uGingrich wadumisa uSantorum, kodwa wakhuluma kanzima kuRomney, okwathi egameni lakhe kwavezwa izikhangiso zokukhangisa ezingezinhle e-Iowa ngokumelene noGingrich.
data.original_reference: Ngemva kokuba kufike imiphumela, uGingrich ubabaze uSantorum, kodwa wayenamazwi anzima kuRomney, lowo owenzelwa umkhankaso wezikhangiso ezimbi e-Iowa ngokumelene noGingrich.

data.translation: UPerry wathi "uzobuyela eTexas ukuyohlola imiphumela yomhlangano wangakusasa, anqume ukuthi ikhona yini indlela engizoyithola kulo mncintiswano", kodwa kamuva wathi uzohlala kulo mncintiswano futhi ancintisane kuma-primary aseSouth Carolina ngoJanuwari 21.

data.translation: Lezi zihlanganisa iNetherlands, lapho u-Anna Jochemsen eseqedile khona okwesishiyagalolunye ekilasini labesifazane e-Super-G izolo, neFinland lapho uKatta Saarinen eseqedile khona okweshumi emcimbini ofanayo.

data.translation: UMichell Gourley wase-Australia ufinyelele endaweni yesi-11 e-Super-G yamadoda. Umncintiswano waseCzech u-Oldrich Jelinek ufinyelele endaweni yesithupha e-Super-G yamadoda.
data.original_reference: U-Mitchell Gourley wase-Australia uqede esikhundleni seshumi nanye esigabeni sabesilise sabamile se-Super-G. Imbangi yaseCzech u-Oldrich Jelinek uqede esikhundleni seshumi nesithupha esigabeni sabesilisa sabahlezi se-Super-G.

data.translation: U-Arly Velasquez waseMexico ufinyelele endaweni yesi-15 e-Super-G yamadoda ahleliyo. U-Adam Hall waseNew Zealand ufinyelele endaweni yesishiyagalolunye e-Super-G yamadoda emile.

data.translation: Umgijimi we-Superspeed we-Super-G wamadoda asePoland ongakwazi ukubona uMaciej Krezel kanye nomqondisi u-Anna Ogarzynska baqedile endaweni yesithathu. I-Jong Seork Park yaseNingizimu Korea yaqedela indawo yama-24 e-Super-G yamadoda ahleliyo.
data.original_reference: Umshushuluzi waseqhweni wase-Poland wesigaba sabesilisa abangaboni kahle u-Maciej Krezel nomqondisi u-Anna Ogarzynska uqede endaweni yeshumi nantathu kuyi-Super-G. UJong Seork Park waseNingizimu Korea uqede endaweni yamashumi amabili nesine esigabeni sabesilisa abahlezi se-Super-G.

data.translation: Ifana ne-television remote, isilawuli sisebenzisa izinzwa ezimbili ezibekwe eduze kwethelevishini yomsebenzisi ukuze sithole indawo yayo endaweni engokwezigaba ezintathu.

data.translation: Umlingani wakhe uFernando Alonso wayehola umncintiswano kodwa waphela ngemva nje kokumisa kwakhe, mhlawumbe ngenxa yesondo langaphambili eliphambene kahle.

data.translation: Ngemva kwemizuzu emihlanu ukuboniswa komkhiqizo umoya uqala ukuzulazula, cishe ngemva komzuzu, umoya ufinyelela ku-70km / h... bese kufika imvula, kodwa eqinile futhi inkulu kangangokuba ishaya isikhumba sakho njengenaliti, bese kwehla isichotho esivela ezulwini, abantu behleka usulu futhi bememeza futhi begijima omunye nomunye.
data.original_reference: Imizuzu emihlanu umbukiso uqalile umoya uqala ukungena, cishe ngemva komzuzu, umoya ufinyelela u-70km/h… bese imvula iyeza, kodwa enzima nenkulu kangangokuba ihlaba isikhumba sakho njengenaliti, bese isichotho sawa emkhathini, abantu bayaxhamazela futhi bayamemeza futhi bayagxobana.
data.corrected_reference: Imizuzu emihlanu umbukiso uqalile umoya uqala ukungena, cishe ngemva komzuzu, umoya ufinyelela u-70km/h… bese imvula iyeza, kodwa enzima nenkulu kangangokuba ihlaba isikhumba sakho njengenaliti, bese isichotho sawa emkhathini, abantu bayaxhamazela futhi bayamemeza futhi bayagxobana.

data.translation: Ngalahlekelwa udadewethu nomngane wakhe, futhi endleleni yami kwakukhona abantu ababili abakhubazekile ababehamba ngamasondo, abantu bevele beqa futhi becindezela kubo, "kusho u-Armand Versace.

data.translation: Umbusi waseCalifornia u-Arnold Schwarzenegger wasayina umthetho owenqabela ukuthengiswa noma ukuqashwa kwemidlalo yamavidiyo enobudlova ezinganeni.

data.translation: Lo mthetho udinga ukuthi imidlalo yamavidiyo enobudlova ethengiswa esifundazweni saseCalifornia ibhalwe nge-decal ethi "18" futhi yenza ukuthengiswa kwayo kumuntu omncane kujeziswe ngenhlawulo engu- $1000 ngecala ngalinye.

data.translation: Omunye umjaho wakhe, iGiant Slalom, wabona ukuthi ufika endaweni yeshumi eqenjini labesifazane ehleli ngezikhathi ezihlangene ze-4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 imizuzu ephansi kunomdlali wokuqala wase-Austria uClaudia Loesch kanye no-1: 09.02 imizuzu ephansi kunomdlali wesishiyagalolunye waseHungary uGyöngyi Dani.
data.original_reference: Omunye umjaho wakhe, i-Giant Slalom, waqeda engoweshumi eqenjini labesifazane elalihlezi nesikhathi esihlanganisiwe esingu-4:41.30, wayesemuva ngo-2:11.60 kuu-Austrian Claudia Loesch owathatha indawo yokuqala futhi wayesemuva ngo- 1:09.02 k-uGyöngyi Dani wase-Hungary owaqeda ekwindawo yesishiyagalolunye.
data.corrected_reference: Omunye umjaho wakhe, i-Giant Slalom, waqeda engoweshumi eqenjini labesifazane elalihlezi nesikhathi esihlanganisiwe esingu-4:41.30, wayesemuva ngo-2:11.60 ku-Austrian Claudia Loesch owathatha indawo yokuqala futhi wayesemuva ngo- 1:09.02 k-uGyöngyi Dani wase-Hungary owaqeda ekwindawo yesishiyagalolunye.

data.translation: Abashushisi abane eqenjini labesifazane abahleli phansi behlulekile ukuqeda imijikelezo yabo, futhi abashushisi abangama-45 kwabali-117 abagijima iGiant Slalom behlulekile ukufinyelela ezingeni lomncintiswano.
data.original_reference: Abashushuluza eqhweni abane eqenjini labesifazane abahlezi bahluleke ukuqeda imijaho yabo, futhi abangu-45 kwabangu-117 abashushuluza eqhweni eSlalom eNkulu bahluleke ukuthola izikhundla emjahweni.

data.translation: Kulabo abangu-1 400 abahlolwa ngaphambi kokhetho luka-2010, labo abaphikisana ne-Australia iba republic bakhule ngamaphesenti angu-8 kusukela ngo-2008.
data.original_reference: Phakathi kwabantu abangu-1,400 abavote ngaphambi kokhetho lukahulumeni 2010, labo ababengavumelani nokuthi i-Australia ibe iriphabhuliki banda ngamaphesenti angu-8 kusukela ngo-2008.

data.translation: UNdunankulu ongumbusi uJulie Gillard wathi ngesikhathi sokukhethwa kukahulumeni ngo-2010 wayekholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kufanele ibe yiRiphabhuliki ekupheleni kokubusa kweNdlovukazi u-Elizabeth II.
data.original_reference: UNdunankulu Wokunakekela uJulia Gillard wathi phakathi nomkhankaso wokhetho lwango-2010 wayekholelwa ukuthi i-Astralia kumelwe ibe izwe elibuswa ngentando yeningi ngemva kokubusa kweNdlovukazi uElizabeth II.

data.translation: Abantu abangamaphesenti angu-34 abaphendulile babonisa ukuthi bafuna uQueen Elizabeth II abe yinkosi yokugcina yase-Australia.
data.original_reference: Amaphesenti angu-34 walabo abavotayo unalombono, ufuna Indlovukazi u-Elizabeth II ukuba abe umbusi wokugcina wase-Australia.
data.corrected_reference: Amaphesenti angu-34 walabo abavotayo unalombono, ufuna Indlovukazi u-Elizabeth II ukuba abe umbusi wokugcina wase-Australia.

data.translation: Ekuphakameni okuphelele, amaphesenti angu-29 alabo abahlolwa bakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kufanele ibe yiRiphabhuliki ngokushesha okukhulu, kuyilapho amaphesenti angu-31 ekholelwa ukuthi i-Australia akufanele neze ibe yiRiphabhuliki.
data.original_reference: Emananini adlulele wokuvota, amaphesentu angu-29 walabo ababuzwe imibuzo bakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kumelwe ibe yiriphabhuliki ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka, kuyilapho amaphesenti angu-31 akholelwa ukuthi i-Australia akumelwe ibe yiriphabhuliki.

data.translation: Umnqobi wegolide wama-Olimpiki kwakumelwe abhace kuma-100 m naku-200 m freestyle naku-3 relay eMidlalo Yezwe Yamazwe Omhlaba, kodwa ngenxa yezikhalazo zakhe ukuqina kwakhe sekungaqiniseki.
data.original_reference: Lowo owathola indondo yegolide kuma-Olimpiki kwakumelwe ahlanganyele emcintiswaneni wokubhukude we-100m kanye ne-200m wokubhukuda nganoma iyiphi indlela futhi kunemidlalo yokunikezelana eMidlalweni yama-Commonwealth, kodwa ngenxa yokukhalaza kwakhe kuyasolwa ukuthi unamandla ngokomzimba.

data.translation: UCurtis Cooper, isazi sezibalo noprofesa wezesayensi yamakhompiyutha eNyuvesi yaseCentral Missouri, uthole inombolo enkulu kunazo zonke eyaziwayo kuze kube manje ngoJanuwari 25.

data.translation: Isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obusekelwe ku-satellite ngokungafani nobuchwepheshe obudala obusekelwe ku-radar yasemhlabeni ukuvumela abalawuli bezimo zezindiza ukuba bakhombe izindiza ngokunemba okukhulu futhi banikeze abashayeli bemikhumbi ulwazi olunembile.

data.translation: Abacwaningi baseNyuvesi yasePrinceton e-United States naseNyuvesi yaseUppsala eSweden babike ukuthi lezi zinhlobo ezintsha zavela ngezizukulwane ezimbili nje kuphela, nakuba kwakukholelwa ukuthi le nqubo ithatha isikhathi eside kakhulu, ngenxa yokuzala phakathi kwe-finch yaseDarwin endemic, i-Geospiza fortes, ne-cactus finch engumfokazi, i-Geospiza conirostris.
data.original_reference: Ubacwaningi abavela eNyuvesi yasePrinceton eMelika kanye naseNyuvesi yase-Uppsala eSweden babike ukuthi izidalwa ezintsha ziziphendukele ngezizukulwane ezimbili kuphela, nakuba lenqubo bekukholelwa ukuthi ithatha isikhathi eside, ngenxa yokuzalela phakathi kwezintaka zika-Darwin ezitholakala kuleyo ndawo kuphela, ama-Geospiza fortes, kanye nezintaka ze-cactus ezithuthele lapho, ama-Geospiza conirostris.
data.corrected_reference: Abacwaningi abavela eNyuvesi yasePrinceton eMelika kanye naseNyuvesi yase-Uppsala eSweden babike ukuthi izidalwa ezintsha ziziphendukele ngezizukulwane ezimbili kuphela, nakuba lenqubo bekukholelwa ukuthi ithatha isikhathi eside, ngenxa yokuzalela phakathi kwezintaka zika-Darwin ezitholakala kuleyo ndawo kuphela, ama-Geospiza fortes, kanye nezintaka ze-cactus ezithuthele lapho, ama-Geospiza conirostris.

data.translation: Ingenziwa ibe mncane kakhulu, futhi inamathele kwenye insimbi. Ingenziwa ibe mncane kakhulu kangangokuba ngezinye izikhathi yayisetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe ezipintwe ngesandla ezincwadini ezibizwa ngokuthi "Imibhalo yesandla ekhanyayo".
data.original_reference: Ingenziwa ibe lula, bese inamathiselwa kwenye insimbi. Ingenziwa ibe lula kangangokuthi kwesinye isikhathi yayisetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe ezidwetshwe ngesandla ezincwadini ezibizwa ngokuthi "illuminated manuscripts".
data.corrected_reference: Ingenziwa ibe ncane kalula, bese inamathiselwa kwenye insimbi. Ingenziwa ibe ncane kangangokuthi kwesinye isikhathi yayisetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe ezidwetshwe ngesandla ezincwadini ezibizwa ngokuthi "illuminated manuscripts".

data.translation: Ijusi lekhowe lishintsha umbala kuye ngokuthi ikhemikhali linamafutha anjani noma linamafutha angakanani (alkali).

data.translation: Ama-ion e-hydrogen angama-proton ayehlwitshwe ama-electron awo (njengoba ama-athomu e-hydrogen ehlanganisa i-proton eyodwa ne-electron eyodwa).

data.translation: Ezikhathini zasendulo zaseGibhithe, ePersi naseChina kwakukhona nezindlu zangasese, kanti ezikhathini zasendulo, emphakathini wamaRoma, izindlu zangasese ngezinye izikhathi zaziyingxenye yezindlu zangasese zomphakathi lapho amadoda nabesifazane babehlangana khona ndawonye enkampanini ehlangene.
data.original_reference: Zazikhona izindlu zangasese eGibhithe, ePheresiya, kanye naseShayina yamandulo. Empucukweni yaseRoma, izindlu zangasese kwesinye isikhathi kwakuyingxenye yezindlu zokugezela zomphakathi lapho abasilisa nabesifazana babehlangana ndawonye.
data.corrected_reference: Zazikhona izindlu zangasese eGibhithe, e, kanye naseShayina yamandulo. Empucukweni yaseRoma, izindlu zangasese kwesinye isikhathi kwakuyingxenye yezindlu zokugezela zomphakathi lapho abasilisa nabesifazana babehlangana ndawonye.

data.translation: Uma ushayela umuntu okude ngezinkulungwane zamamayela, usebenzisa isathelayithi.

data.translation: Isathelayithi esikhaleni liyithola leyo nqubo bese liyibuyisela emuva, cishe ngaso leso sikhathi.
data.original_reference: Isiphuphutheki esisemkhathini sithola ucingo bese siluthumela emuva ezansi, cishe ngaleso sikhathi.
data.corrected_reference: Isiphuphutheki esisemkhathini sithola ucingo bese siluthumela emuva ezansi, cishe ngaleso sikhathi.

data.translation: Isathelayithi lathunyelwa esikhaleni ngomkhumbi. Ososayensi basebenzisa izibonakude esikhaleni ngoba umoya womhlaba uphazamisa ukukhanya kwethu nombono wethu.
data.original_reference: Isethilayithi ithunyelwe emkhathini kusentshenziswa i-rocket. Ososayensi basebenzise izibona kude ezisemkhathini ngoba umkhathi uphazamisa okunye kokukhanya kwethu kanye nokubona.
data.corrected_reference: Isethilayithi ithunyelwe emkhathini kusentshenziswa irokhethi. Ososayensi basebenzise izibona kude ezisemkhathini ngoba umkhathi uphazamisa okunye kokukhanya kwethu kanye nokubona.

data.translation: Kudinga irekheti elikhulu elingaphezu kwamamitha angu-100 ukuphakama ukuze kufakwe isathelayithi noma itheleskopu esikhaleni.

data.translation: Isondo liye lasishintsha izwe ngezindlela ezingakholeki futhi into enkulu kunazo zonke isondo elisenzele yona ukusinika ukuhamba okulula nokusheshayo.
data.original_reference: Isondo seliguqule umhlaba ngezindlela ezimangalisayo. Into enkulu ukuthi isondo elisenzele yona ukusinika indlela yokuthutha elula neshesha kakhulu.
data.corrected_reference: Isondo seliguqule umhlaba ngezindlela ezimangalisayo. Into enkulu ukuthi isondo elisenzele yona ukusinika indlela yokuthutha elula neshesha kakhulu.

data.translation: Lasilethela isitimela, imoto nezinye izinto eziningi zokuhamba.
data.original_reference: Isilethele isitimela, imoto, kanye nezinye izisetshenziswa zokuthutha.
data.corrected_reference: Isilethele isitimela, imoto, kanye nezinye izisetshenziswa zokuthutha.

data.translation: Ngaphansi kwazo kunamakati amancane anobukhulu obuphakathi adla izisulu ezinobukhulu obuphakathi kusukela kumakonogwaze kuya kuma-antelope nasezintabeni.
data.original_reference: Ngaphansi kwazo kukhona amakati amancanyana ngobukhulu adla inyama ebanjelwa ukudliwakusuka kunogwaja kuya ezinyamazaneni.
data.corrected_reference: Ngaphansi kwazo kukhona amakati amancanyana ngobukhulu adla inyama ebanjelwa ukudliwakusuka kunogwaja kuya ezinyamazaneni.

data.translation: Okokugcina, kunamakati amancane amaningi (kuhlanganise namakati aphilayo) adla izilwane ezincane eziningi kakhulu njengezinambuzane, izimpethu, izintuthwane nezinyoni.
data.original_reference: Ekugcineni, kunamakati amaningi amancane (kuhlanganise namakati afuywayo azizulelayo) adla izilwanyane ezizingelwayo eziningi kakhulu njengezinambuzane, izilwane eziququdayo, izibankwa, kanye nezinyoni.
data.corrected_reference: Ekugcineni, kunamakati amaningi amancane (kuhlanganise namakati afuywayo azizulelayo) adla izilwanyane ezizingelwayo eziningi kakhulu njengezinambuzane, izilwane eziququdayo, izibankwa, kanye nezinyoni.

data.translation: Imfihlo yempumelelo yabo ingumqondo we-niche, umsebenzi okhethekile ikati ngalinye eliwenza ukuze lingaqhudelani nabanye.
data.original_reference: Imfihlo yempumelelo yabo umcabango wesikhundla, umsebenzi okhethekile ikati ngalinye elinawo olenza lingancintisani namanye.
data.corrected_reference: Imfihlo yempumelelo yabo umcabango wesikhundla, umsebenzi okhethekile ikati ngalinye elinawo olenza lingancintisani namanye.

data.translation: Izingonyama ziyizinhlobo zamakati ezihlala ndawonye, ezihlala ngamaqembu amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi ama-pride.
data.original_reference: Amabhubesi angamakati anobudlelwane kakhulu, aphila ngamaqembu amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi umhlambi.
data.corrected_reference: Amabhubesi angamakati anobudlelwane kakhulu, aphila ngamaqembu amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi umhlambi.

data.translation: Ama-pride akha abesilisa abavuthiwe abahlobene no - 1 kuya kwabathathu, kanye nabesifazane nabantombazane abangaba ngu - 30.
data.original_reference: Imihlambi yakhiwa iduna elilodwa noma amathathu ahlobene, ngokufanayo nezinsikazi ezintathu kanye namawundlu.
data.corrected_reference: Imihlambi yakhiwa iduna elilodwa noma amathathu ahlobene, ngokufanayo nezinsikazi ezintathu kanye namawundlu.

data.translation: Ngokuvamile izinsikazi zihlobene kakhulu, futhi ziwumkhaya omkhulu odade namadodakazi.
data.original_reference: Abesifazane ngokuvamile bahlobene, okuwumndeni omkhulu wodadewabo noma amadodakazi.
data.corrected_reference: Abesifazane ngokuvamile bahlobene, okuwumndeni omkhulu wodadewabo noma amadodakazi.

data.translation: Izilwane eziqhosha njengamabhubesi zenza izinto ezifana nemihlambi yezimvu noma izinja, izilwane ezifana kakhulu nezilwane (kodwa hhayi ezinye amakati amakhulu) ekuziphatheni kwazo, futhi zibulala kakhulu izisulu zazo.
data.original_reference: Ivuyo lamabhubesi liziphatha njengomhlambi wamanketshane, izilwane ezifana namabhubesi ngokumangalisayo (kodwa hhayi amanye amakati amakhulu) ngokuziphatha, kanye futhi nokuba yingozi ezilwaneni ezizizingelayo.
data.corrected_reference: Ivuyo lamabhubesi liziphatha njengomhlambi wamanketshane, izilwane ezifana namabhubesi ngokumangalisayo (kodwa hhayi amanye amakati amakhulu) ngokuziphatha, kanye futhi nokuba yingozi ezilwaneni ezizizingelayo.

data.translation: Njengoba ingumdlali ozungezile, ingwe ingakwazi ukukhuphuka (nakuba ingakhuli kahle), ukubhukuda, ukugijima ibanga elide futhi idonse ngamandla aphindwe kahlanu kunomuntu oqinile.
data.original_reference: Umgadli ophelele, ihlosi lingakhuphuka (yize lingakwazi kahle), libhukude, ligxume amabanga amade futhi lidonse ngamandla womuntu onamandla aphindwe kasihlanu.
data.corrected_reference: Umgadli ophelele, ihlosi lingakhuphuka (yize lingakwazi kahle), libhukude, ligxume amabanga amade futhi lidonse ngamandla womuntu onamandla aphindwe kasihlanu.

data.translation: Le tiger iyinhlobo eyodwa (iGeneus Panthera) yezingonyama, amahlosi kanye nama-jaguar.
data.original_reference: Ithayiga lisesigabeni esifanayo (Genus Panthera) njengamabhubesi, izingwe, kanye nama-jaguar. Lawa makati amane yiwo kuphela akwazi ukubhonga.
data.corrected_reference: Ithayiga lisesigabeni esifanayo (Genus Panthera) njengamabhubesi, izingwe, kanye nama-jaguar. Lawa makati amane yiwo kuphela akwazi ukubhonga.

data.translation: Ukuvuthuluka kwengwe akufani nokubhonga kwebhubesi okuzwakalayo, kodwa kunjengomusho wamazwi anomsindo, amemeza.
data.original_reference: Ukubhonga kwehlosi akufani ncamashi nokubhonga kwengonyama, kodwa kucishe kufane nomusho wamagama entukuthelo, amenyezwayo.
data.corrected_reference: Ukubhonga kwehlosi akufani ncamashi nokubhonga kwengonyama, kodwa kucishe kufane nomusho wamagama entukuthelo, amenyezwayo.

data.translation: Izilwane ezidla izilwane ezincane ziyabamba izinkawu, izinyoka, izimpethu nezinyoni uma zikwazi.
data.original_reference: Amakati wasendle amakhulu waseMelika athanda ukudla izilwane ezincane. Azobamba izimfene, izinyoka, izilwane eziququdayo kanye nezinyoni uma angakwazi. Cishe zonke izilwane ezizingelwa yilawa makati zincane kakhulu kunawo.
data.corrected_reference: Ama-ocelots athanda ukudla izilwane ezincane. Azobamba izimfene, izinyoka, izilwane eziququdayo kanye nezinyoni uma angakwazi. Cishe zonke izilwane ezizingelwa yilawa makati zincane kakhulu kunawo.

data.translation: Ososayensi bacabanga ukuthi ama-ocelots alandela futhi athole izilwane azidla (izisulu) ngephunga, eziphunga lapho bezikade khona emhlabathini.
data.original_reference: Ososayensi bakholelwa ukuthi amakati amakhulu waseMelika alandelela futhi athola izilwane zokuzidla (izilwane ezizingelwayo) ngokunuka, efufuza lapho bezikhona phansi.
data.corrected_reference: Ososayensi bakholelwa ukuthi ama-ocelots alandelela futhi athola izilwane zokuzidla (izilwane ezizingelwayo) ngokunuka, efufuza lapho bezikhona phansi.

data.translation: Zibona kahle ebumnyameni ngombono wasebusuku, futhi zihamba ngokucasha kakhulu.
data.original_reference: Ayakwazi ukubona kahle kakhulu ebumnyameni ngekhono lokubona ebusuku, abuye ahambe ngesinyenyela esikhulu, futhi. Ama-ocelot azingela izisulu zawo ngokuzifanisa nendawo akuyo bese agxumela izisulu zawo.
data.corrected_reference: Ayakwazi ukubona kahle kakhulu ebumnyameni ngekhono lokubona ebusuku, abuye ahambe ngesinyenyela esikhulu, futhi. Ama-ocelot azingela izisulu zawo ngokuzifanisa nendawo akuyo bese agxumela izisulu zawo.

data.translation: Uma iqembu elincane lezinto eziphilayo (isixuku esincane) lihlukaniswa nesizukulwane esikhulu esivela kuso (njengokuthi uma lihamba phezu kwentaba noma umfula, noma lihambela esiqhingini esisha ukuze lingakwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) ngokuvamile lizithola lisendaweni ehlukile kunangaphambili.
data.original_reference: Lapho iqembu elincane lezinto eziphilayo (inani elincane) lihlukana eqenjini elikhulu elisuka kulo (cishe lapho liya ngaphesheya kokhahlamba lwentaba noma umfula, noma uma liya esiqhingini esisha kangangokuba lingakwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) ngokuvamile lizozithola endaweni ehlukile kunaleyo ebezikuyo ngaphambili.
data.corrected_reference: Lapho iqembu elincane lezinto eziphilayo (inani elincane) lihlukana eqenjini elikhulu elisuka kulo (cishe lapho liya ngaphesheya kokhahlamba lwentaba noma umfula, noma uma liya esiqhingini esisha kangangokuba lingakwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) ngokuvamile lizozithola endaweni ehlukile kunaleyo ebezikuyo ngaphambili.

data.translation: Le ndawo entsha inezinsizakusebenza ezahlukene kanye nezimbangi ezahlukene, ngakho-ke abantu abasha bayodinga izici noma ukuguqulwa okuhlukile ukuze babe izimbangi ezinamandla kunalokho ababekudinga ngaphambili.
data.original_reference: Le ndawo entsha inezinsizakusebenza ezihlukile nabancintisani abahlukene, ngakho-ke umphakathi omusha uzodinga izici ezihlukile noma ukuzivumelanisa nezimo ukuze ube ngabancintisani abaqinile kunalokho ababekudinga ngaphambilini.
data.corrected_reference: Le ndawo entsha inezinsizakusebenza ezihlukile nabancintisani abahlukene, ngakho-ke umphakathi omusha uzodinga izici ezihlukile noma ukuzivumelanisa nezimo ukuze ube ngabancintisani abaqinile kunalokho ababekudinga ngaphambilini.

data.translation: Abantu bokuqala abashintshanga nhlobo, basadinga ukuguqulwa okufanayo njengakuqala.
data.original_reference: Izidalwa ezazikhona zasekuqaleni azikashintshi, zisadinga indlela yokuphila efana neyangaphambili.
data.corrected_reference: Izidalwa ezazikhona zasekuqaleni azikashintshi, zisadinga indlela yokuphila efana neyangaphambili.

data.translation: Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, njengoba abantu abasha beqala ukuzivumelanisa nendawo yabo entsha, baqala ukubukeka bengafani nabanye abantu.
data.original_reference: Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, njengoba iqembu elisha liqala ukujwayela indawo yalo entsha, liqala ukuya libukeka lingafani neqembu elinye.
data.corrected_reference: Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, njengoba iqembu elisha liqala ukujwayela indawo yalo entsha, liqala ukuya libukeka lingafani neqembu elinye.

data.translation: Ekugcineni, ngemva kwezinkulungwane noma ngisho nezigidi zeminyaka, lezi zinhlanga ezimbili ziyobonakala zihluke kakhulu kangangokuba ngeke zibizwe ngohlobo olufanayo.
data.original_reference: Ekugcineni, ngemva kweminyaka eyizinkulungwane noma ngisho eyizigidi, amaqembu amabili azobukeka ehlukile kangangokuba angeke abizwe ngokuthi uhlobo olulodwa.

data.translation: Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukuvela kwezinhlobo ezintsha, okuyinto engenakugwenywa futhi eyingxenye ebalulekile yokuziphendukela kwemvelo.
data.original_reference: Sibiza lokhu kwenza ngokuthi ukwakheka, okushe nje ukwakhekha kwezinhlobo ezintsha. Lokhu kwakheka umphumela ongakwemeki kanye nengxenye ebaluleke kakhulu yokuziphendukela kwemvelo.
data.corrected_reference: Le nqubo siyibiza nge-speciation, okushe nje ukwakhekha kwezinhlobo ezintsha. Lokhu kwakheka umphumela ongakwemeki kanye nengxenye ebaluleke kakhulu yokuziphendukela kwemvelo.

data.translation: Izitshalo zikhiqiza umoya - moya abantu abawuphefumulayo, futhi zithatha i - carbon dioxide abantu abawuphefumulayo (okungukuthi, baphefumula).
data.original_reference: Izitshalo zenza i-oxygen leyo ephefumulwa abantu, futhi zithatha i-carbon-dioxide leyo ekhishwa abantu (okungukuthi, ukuphefumula ukhiphe umoya).
data.corrected_reference: Izitshalo zenza i-oxygen leyo ephefumulwa abantu, futhi zithatha i-carbon-dioxide leyo ekhishwa abantu (okungukuthi, ukuphefumula ukhiphe umoya).

data.translation: Izitshalo zenza ukudla kwazo elangeni ngokwenza izithombe futhi zinikeza nomthunzi.
data.original_reference: Izitshalo zenza ukudla kwazo nge-photosynthesis. Zibuye zenze nomthunzi.
data.corrected_reference: Izitshalo zenza ukudla kwazo nge-photosynthesis. Zibuye zenze nomthunzi.

data.translation: Senza izindlu zethu ngezitshalo, senza izingubo zethu ngezitshalo, futhi ukudla kwethu okuningi yizitshalo. Izilwane ngeke ziphile ngaphandle kwezitshalo.
data.original_reference: Senza izindlu zethu ngezitshalo futhi senza nezingubo ngezitshalo. Ukudla okuningi esikudlayo izitshalo. Ngaphandle kwezitshalo, izilwane angeke ziqhubeke ziphila.

data.translation: UMosaurus wayengumzingeli omkhulu kunabo bonke ngesikhathi sakhe, ngakho wayengesabi lutho, ngaphandle kwamanye ama-mosasaurus.
data.original_reference: I-mosasaurus bekuyisilwane esizingelayo esiyinhloko ngesikhathi sayo, ngakho-ke yayingesabi lutho, ngaphandle kwama-mosasaurus amanye.
data.corrected_reference: I-mosasaurus bekuyisilwane esizingelayo esiyinhloko ngesikhathi sayo, ngakho-ke yayingesabi lutho, ngaphandle kwama-mosasaurus amanye.

data.translation: Izinsini zayo ezinde zazinamazinyo acwebile angaphezu kuka-70 kanye nesethi eyengeziwe emnyango womlomo wayo, okusho ukuthi kwakungekho ndawo yokuphuma kunoma yini eyayizwela indlela yayo.
data.original_reference: Imihlathi yayo emide eyayihlome ngamazinyo acijise okwensingo angaphezu kuka-70, kanye namanye engeziwe phezu komlomo wayo, okusho ukuthi kwakungekho lutho esondela eduze kwayo eyayingaphunyuka.

data.translation: Asazi ngokuqinisekile, kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi yayinenhlebo. Ukudla kwayo kwakuhlanganisa iziphethu, izinhlanzi ezinkulu, ezinye izilwane ezifuywayo, futhi kungenzeka ukuthi yayingumdlali.
data.original_reference: Asazi ngokuqinisekile, kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi yayinolimi olusamfoloko. Ukudla eyayikudla kuhlanganisa izimfudu, izinhlanzi ezinkulu, ama-mosasaurus amanye, futhi kungenzeka nokuthi yayiyizimu.

data.translation: Nakuba ukudla kwabo okuningi kwakujwayele kithi, amaRoma ayenakho ukudla okungavamile noma okungavamile, kuhlanganise nengulube yasendle, i - peacock, izigaxa, nohlobo lwesilwane esiphaphile okuthiwa i - dormouse
data.original_reference: Ngenkathi iningi lokukudla kwabo kungaba okujwayelekile kuthina, amaRoma eyenesabelo sabo sezinto zemikhosi ezingajwayelekile, kubandakanya izingulube zasendle, ipigogo, iminenke, nohlobo lwegundane olubizwa nge-dormouse

data.translation: Okunye okwahluke kakhulu kwakuwukuthi lapho abantu abampofu nabesifazane bedla ukudla kwabo besahleli ezihlalweni, amadoda acebile ayejabulela ukuba nemikhosi ndawonye lapho ayehlala khona eceleni kwawo lapho edla ukudla kwawo.
data.original_reference: Omunye umehluko kwakuwukuthi nakuba abantu abampofu kanye nabesifazane babedla ukudla kwabo babe behlezi ezihlalweni, amadoda acebile ayethanda ukuba namadili ndawonye lapho ayehlala khona ngezinhlangothi kuyilapho edla ukudla kwawo.

data.translation: Ukudla kwaseRoma lasendulo kwakungahlanganisi ukudla okwafika eYurophu kusuka eMelika noma e-Asia emakhulwini eminyaka kamuva.

data.translation: Ngokwesibonelo, babengenazo ummbila, namatamatisi, amazambane, noma i-coa, futhi akekho umRoma wasendulo owake wanambitha inyoni.

data.translation: Nakuba izwe ngalinye lalingase 'lisuswe eScandinavia', kwakunokuhluka okuningi phakathi kwabantu, amakhosi, amasiko nomlando waseDenmark, eSweden, eNorway nase-Iceland.

data.translation: Emuva kweSitatimende Sokuzimela kwakubhalwe amazwi athi "Isitatimende Sokuzimela Sokuqala sangoJulayi 4 1776". Umbhalo ubonakala phansi kwedokhumenti, uphahla.

data.translation: Nakuba kungekho owaziyo ngokuqinisekile ukuthi ubani owaloba, kuyaziwa ukuthi ekuqaleni kwayo, lo mbhalo omkhulu (osayizi bawo bangamasentimitha angu - 29 3⁄4 no - 24 1⁄2) wawugubungelwa ukugcinwa.
data.original_reference: Yize kungekho owaziyo ngokuqinisekile ukuthi ngubani oyibhalile, kuyaziwa ukuthi ekuqaleni kokuphila kwayo, idokhumenti yesikhumba (inobukhulu obungamayintshi angu-29¾ ngamayintshi angu-24½) yayisongwa ukuze igcinwe.
data.corrected_reference: Yize kungekho owaziyo ngokuqinisekile ukuthi ngubani oyibhalile, kuyaziwa ukuthi ekuqaleni kokuphila kwayo, idokhumenti enkulu yesikhumba (ilinganisa ama-intshi angu-29¾ ngamayintshi angu-24½) yayigoqwe ukuze igcinwe.

data.translation: Amadolobha-ezizwe angumanduleli wezizwe. Isiko lempucuko lisho ukudluliswa kolwazi phakathi kwezizukulwane eziningana, umzila wesiko ohlala njalo nokusakazwa okulungile.

data.translation: ICongress yayingenalo igunya lokubeka izintela, futhi ngenxa yokuthi yayingekho i - executive noma i - judiciary kazwelonke, yayincike ezikhungweni zombuso, ezazingabambisani njalo, ukuze iphoqelele zonke izenzo zayo.
data.original_reference: Ukhongolose wabe engenawo amandla okubeka intela, futhi, ngenxa yokuthi bokungekho sigungu sezwe noma noma isigungu sokwahlulela, uncike ezikhulwini zombuso, ezazingabambisani izikhathi ezingi, ukuphoqelela yonke imithetho yawo.

data.translation: Ngo-1624, iDutch East India Company yasungula isisekelo eningizimu-ntshonalanga yeTaiwan, yaqala ukuguqulwa kwemikhuba yokulima okusanhlamvu kwabomdabu futhi yaqasha izisebenzi zaseChina ukuba zisebenze emasimini ayo elayisi noshukela.
data.original_reference: Ngo1624,inkampani yaseNdiya yeDutch East yamisa isikhungo eningizimu ntshonalanga Taiwan, iqalisa ukushintshwa kokukhiqizwa kokusanhlamvu komdabu futhi iqasha izisebenzi zaseShayina ukuba zisebenze emasimini welayisi noshukela.
data.corrected_reference: Ngo-1624, i-Dutch East India Company yamisa isikhungo eningizimu ntshonalanga Taiwan, iqalisa ukushintshwa kokukhiqizwa kokusanhlamvu komdabu futhi iqasha izisebenzi zaseShayina ukuba zisebenze emasimini welayisi noshukela.

data.translation: Ngo-1683, amabutho aseQing Dynasty (ngo-1644-1912) athatha ukulawula izindawo ezisogwini olusentshonalanga nasenyakatho yeTaiwan futhi amemezela iTaiwan njengezifundazwe zoMbuso WaseQing ngo-1885.
data.original_reference: Ngo-1683, amabutho obukhosi buka-Qing (1644-1912) athatha izindawo ezingasogwini ezisentshonalanga nasenyakatho ne-Taiwan futhi amisa i-Taiwan njengesifundazwe sombuso ka-Qing ngo-1885.
data.corrected_reference: Ngo-1683, amabutho obukhosi buka-Qing (1644-1912) athatha izindawo ezingasogwini ezisentshonalanga nasenyakatho ne-Taiwan futhi amisa i-Taiwan njengesifundazwe sombuso ka-Qing ngo-1885.

data.translation: Ngo-1895, ngemva kokunqotshwa eMpini Yokuqala YaseChina NaseJapane (1894-1895), uhulumeni kaQing wasayina iSimonoseki Treaty, lapho wanikela khona ubukhosi baseTaiwan eJapane, eyabusa lesi siqhingi kwaze kwaba ngo-1945.
data.original_reference: Ngo-1895, ngemva kokuhlulwa eMpini Yokuqala yamaJapani yase—ino (1894-1895), uhulumeni wase-Qing usayina Isivumelwano se-Simonoseki, ngaso edlulisela iTaiwan eJapani, ebusa isiqhingi kuze kube ngu-1945.
data.corrected_reference: Ngo-1895, ngemva kokuhlulwa eMpini Yokuqala yamaJapani yase—ino (1894-1895), uhulumeni wase-Qing usayina Isivumelwano se-Simonoseki, ngaso edlulisela iTaiwan eJapani, ebusa isiqhingi kuze kube ngu-1945.

data.translation: Ngakho-ke, isilinganiso sezinhlangothi zale fomati (ukuhlukanisa ngamashumi amabili nambili ukuze kutholakale isilinganiso esilula kunazo zonke sezinombolo eziphelele) kuthiwa ngu-3: 2.
data.original_reference: Isilinganiso sobubanzi ebudeni salefomethi (ukudivayida ngeshumi nambili ukuze uthole isilinganiso senombolo ephelele elula) ngakho-ke kuthiwa singu-3:2.
data.corrected_reference: Isilinganiso sobubanzi ebudeni salefomethi (ukudivayida ngeshumi nambili ukuze uthole isilinganiso senombolo ephelele elula) ngakho-ke kuthiwa singu-3:2.

data.translation: Amafomethi amaningi avamile (ngokwesibonelo, umndeni wamafomethi we-APS) alingana noma asondela eduze nalesi sici.
data.original_reference: Amafomethi amaningi avamile (iqoqo lamafomethi le-APS, ngokwesibonelo) ayalingana noma acishe alingane nalesi silinganiso sobubanzi ebudeni.

data.translation: Umthetho wesithathu, ohlukunyezwa kakhulu futhi owenza inhlekisa ngawo, uyisiqondiso esilula esidala amandla ngenkathi ugcina isilinganiso esithile sokuhleleka esithombeni.
data.original_reference: Lomthetho wezingxenye ezintathu esetshenziswa kabi kakhulu nonganakwa ngokuvamile isiqondiso esilula sokwenza ubuhle ube ugcina izinga lokuhleleka esithombeni.

data.translation: Ithi indawo ephumelela kunazo zonke kumuntu ophethe indaba eyinhloko isendaweni lapho imigqa ihlangana khona ehlukanisa isithombe sibe izingxenye ezintathu ngokuqondile nangokuphambene (bheka isibonelo).

data.translation: Enye yezimfundiso eziyinhloko zobuKristu ukuthi ingcebo kufanele isetshenziselwe ukunciphisa ukuhlupheka nobuphofu nokuthi imali yesonto ikhona ngokukhethekile ngenxa yalesi sizathu.

data.translation: Igunya eliyinhloko lesonto lase lihlezi eRoma iminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane futhi lokhu kugxila kwamandla nemali kwabangela abaningi ukuba babuze ukuthi le mfundiso yayigcinwa yini.

data.translation: Ngokushesha ngemva kokuqala kwempi, iBrithani yaqala ukuvinjezelwa kweJalimane.

data.translation: Leli qhinga laphumelela, lavimbela izimpahla ezibalulekile zempi nezakhamuzi, nakuba lokhu kuvinjelwa kwakuyiphutha elisemthethweni wamazwe omhlaba owamukelwayo olwalubhalwe ezivumelwaneni eziningi zamazwe omhlaba phakathi namakhulu amabili eminyaka adlule.
data.original_reference: Isu libonakale lisebenza, ukususwa kwezinto ezidingwa ibutho lamasosha nabantu abavamile, nakuba lokhu kuvimbela kuphule imithetho yamazwe wonke elungiswe izivumelwano zamazwe amaningana wamakhulu amabili eminyaka adlule.
data.corrected_reference: Isu libonakale lisebenza, ukususwa kwezinto ezidingwa ibutho lamasosha nabantu abavamile, nakuba lokhu kuvimbela kuphule imithetho yamazwe wonke elungiswe izivumelwano zamazwe amaningana wamakhulu amabili eminyaka adlule.

data.translation: IBrithani yayihlala imayini emanzini aphesheya kwezilwandle ukuze imikhumbi ingafiki emikhumbi eyingxenye yolwandle, futhi lokhu kwakusongela ngisho nemikhumbi engathathi hlangothi.
data.original_reference: I-Britain imba amanzi ezwekazi ukuze ivimbele imikhumbi ukuthi ingene kuyo yonke ingxenye yolwandle, okubangela izingozi ngisho nasemikhunjini evamile.

data.translation: Njengoba la maqhinga ayephendulwa ngendlela elinganiselwe, iJalimane yayilindele impendulo efanayo emzabalazweni wayo ongenamkhawulo wezindiza ezingaphansi kwamanzi.

data.translation: Ngo-1884, uTesla wathuthela e - United States of America ukuze amukele umsebenzi e - Edison Company eNew York City.

data.translation: Wafika e-US enamagatsha amane ngegama lakhe, incwadi yezinkondlo, kanye nencwadi yokuncoma evela kuCharles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambilini) eya kuThomas Edison.

data.translation: EChina lasendulo kwakunendlela eyingqayizivele yokubonisa izinkathi ezahlukene; isigaba ngasinye seChina noma umndeni ngamunye owawubusa wawuyinzalo ehlukile.

data.translation: Phakathi nalezi zikhathi, kwakukhona iminyaka engazinzile yezifundazwe ezahlukene, futhi eyaziwa kakhulu yilezi zikhathi kwakuyiNkathi Yobukhosi Obuthathu eyayithatha iminyaka engama-60 phakathi kweHan neJin Dynasty.

data.translation: I-Giza Plateau, noma i- "Giza Necropolis" e- Egyptian Valley of the Dead iqukethe ama- pyramid amaningana (apho i- Great Pyramid ingeyona enkulu kakhulu), amathuna amaningana amancane, amathempeli amaningana, ne- Sphinx enkulu.
data.original_reference: IThafa Eliphakeme laseGiza, noma “iGiza Necropolis” eSigodini sabaFile saseGibhithe linemibhoshongo emingxa-ntathu eminingana (leyo umbhoshongo omkhulu kuyiwo omkhulu kakhulu), amathuna amaningana amancane, amathempeli amaningana, kanye ne-Sphinx enkulu.
data.corrected_reference: I-Giza Plateau, noma "i-Giza Necropolis" eSigodini sabaFile saseGibhithe linemibhoshongo emingxa-ntathu eminingana (leyo umbhoshongo omkhulu kuyiwo omkhulu kakhulu), amathuna amaningana amancane, amathempeli amaningana, kanye ne-Sphinx enkulu.

data.translation: Iphiramidi elikhulu lakhiwa ukuhlonipha uFaro Khufu, futhi eziningi zamapiramidi amancane, amathuna namathempeli zakhiwa ukuhlonipha omkaKhufu namalungu omndeni.
data.original_reference: Umbhoshongo omkhulu ongunxa-ntathu wakhelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro uKhufu, futhi neminye imibhoshongo engunxa-ntathu emincanyana, amathuna, kanye namathempeli akhelwe ukuhlonipha inkosikazi kaKhufu kanye namalungu omndeni.
data.corrected_reference: Umbhoshongo omkhulu ongunxa-ntathu wakhelwa ukuhlonipha uFaro uKhufu, futhi neminye imibhoshongo engunxa-ntathu emincanyana, amathuna, kanye namathempeli akhelwe ukuhlonipha inkosikazi kaKhufu kanye namalungu omndeni.

data.translation: Umaki we "up bow" ubukeka njenge V kanti umaki we "down bow" ubukeka njengengxenye yomgogodla noma isikwele esingasekho ohlangothini lwayo olungenhla.
data.original_reference: Uphawu "lokukhothama umile" olubukeka njengo-V kanti "uphawu lokukhothama phansi" lubukeka njengesigaxa noma isikwele esishoda ngohlangothi lwaso olungaphansi.
data.corrected_reference: Uphawu "lomnsalo ophezulu" olubukeka njengo-V kanti "uphawu lomnsalo ophansi" lubukeka njengesigaxa noma isikwele esishoda ngohlangothi lwaso olungaphansi.

data.translation: Phezulu kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale esiqongweni bese ushaya umnsalo, bese phansi kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale emngxenyeni (lapho isandla sakho sibamba umnsalo) bese udonsa umnsalo.
data.original_reference: Phezulu kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale ekugcineni bese uphusha umcibisholo, kanti phansi kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale exoxweni (okusho ukuthi lapho ubambe khona umcibisholo) bese ugobisa umcibisholo.
data.corrected_reference: Phezulu kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale ekugcineni bese uphusha umnsalo, kanti phansi kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale exoxweni (okusho ukuthi lapho ubambe khona umnsalo) bese ugobisa umcibisholo.

data.translation: Umcibisholo ophakeme ngokuvamile udala umsindo omnene, kuyilapho umcibisholo ophansi uqinile futhi uqiniseke ngokwengeziwe.
data.original_reference: Umnsalo ophezulu ujwayele ukwenza umsindo opholile, kanti umnsalo ophansi wenza umsindo onamandla noqinile kakhudlwana.
data.corrected_reference: Umnsalo ophezulu ujwayele ukwenza umsindo opholile, kanti umnsalo ophansi wenza umsindo onamandla noqinile kakhudlwana.

data.translation: Zizwe ukhululekile ukufaka amapeni akho, kodwa khumbula ukuthi amapeni okugoba abhalwe phansi akhona ngenxa yesizathu somculo, ngakho ngokuvamile kufanele ahlonishwe.

data.translation: Inkosi eyayethukile uLouis XVI, iNdlovukazi uMary Antoinette izingane zabo ezimbili ezincane (uMarie Therese oneminyaka engu-11 noLouis-Charles oneminyaka emine) nodadewabo wenkosi, uNkk Elizabeth, ngo-Okthoba 6th 1789 baphoqeleka ukuba babuyele eParis bevela eVersailles yiqembu labesifazane bezimakethe.
data.original_reference: Inkosi uLouis XVI ethukile, iNdlovukazi uMarie Antoinette kanye nezingane zabo ezincane ezimbili (uMarie Therese oneminyaka engu-11 ubudala kanye noLouis-Charles eneminyaka emine ubudala) kanye nodadewabo weNkosi, iNkosazana u-Elizabeth, ngomhla ka-6 Okthoba 1789 baphoqelelwa ukubuyela eParis besuka eVersailles uquqaba lwabesifazane basemakethe.
data.corrected_reference: Inkosi uLouis XVI ethukile, iNdlovukazi uMarie Antoinette kanye nezingane zabo ezincane ezimbili (uMarie Therese oneminyaka engu-11 ubudala kanye noLouis-Charles eneminyaka emine ubudala) kanye nodadewabo weNkosi, iNkosazana u-Elizabeth, ngomhla ka-6 kuMfumfu 1789 baphoqelelwa ukubuyela eParis besuka eVersailles uquqaba lwabesifazane basemakethe.

data.translation: Zaphoqeleka ukuba zikhokhe izintela kuhulumeni wamakoloni wase-United States ukuze zikhokhe ingxenye enkulu yezindleko kanye nenzalo yamabhondi ayeshaywa egameni likahulumeni wasePhilippines ngokusebenzisa amabhange aseWall Street.

data.translation: Yiqiniso, inzuzo enkulu evela ekuxhasweni kwabantu basePhilippines isikhathi eside yayiyoba inzuzo eyisisekelo yombuso wasemakhaya wase - United States.

data.translation: Inkathi lapho izenzakalo zenzeka khona ivame ukubizwa ngokuthi iHigh Middle Ages. Isikhathi somlando waseYurophu ngekhulu le-11, le-12 nele-13 (AD 1000 1300).
data.original_reference: Inkathi lapho kube nesehlakalo khona ivame ukubhekiselwa ngokuthi Inkathi Ephakathi Ephezulu inkathi yomlando waseYurophu ngekhulu lama-11, lama-12, kanye nelama-13 leminyaka (AD 1000–1300).

data.translation: I-High Middle Ages yayandulelwa i-Early Middle Ages futhi ilandelwe yi-Late Middle Ages, okuyinto ngokwesiko iphela cishe ngo-1500.
data.original_reference: IHigh Middle Ages yandulelwa i-Early Middle Ages futhi yase ilandelwa iLate Middle Ages, ngokwenjwayelo iphela ngabo ends around 1500.
data.corrected_reference: IHigh Middle Ages yandulelwa i-Early Middle Ages futhi yase ilandelwa iLate Middle Ages, ngokwenjwayelo iphela ngabo ends around 1500.

data.translation: Ukuzimisela kwezobuchwepheshe yigama elihlanganisa uhla olubanzi lwemiqondo esebenzayo, kusukela ekucindezelweni kwezobuchwepheshe noma ekufuneni kwezobuchwepheshe kuya emqondweni oqinile wokuthi ikusasa lomuntu lilawulwa yinqubo engokwemvelo ehlobene nemithetho yesayensi kanye nokubonakaliswa kwayo kwezobuchwepheshe.
data.original_reference: Inkolelo yokumiselwa okungokwezobuchwepheshe igama elihlanganisa imibono eminingi esebenzayo, kusukela ekusebenziseni ezobuchwepheshe ezikhona noma ekutheni ezobuchwepheshe ziyadingeka kuya emuzweni oqinile wokuthi ukumiselwa kwesintu kuholwa umcabango ojulile ohlobene nemithetho yesayensi nokubonakala kwayo kwezobuchwepheshe.
data.corrected_reference: Inkolelo yokumiselwa okungokwezobuchwepheshe igama elihlanganisa imibono eminingi esebenzayo, kusukela ekusebenziseni ezobuchwepheshe ezikhona noma ekutheni ezobuchwepheshe ziyadingeka kuya emuzweni oqinile wokuthi ukumiselwa kwesintu kuholwa umcabango ojulile ohlobene nemithetho yesayensi nokubonakala kwayo kwezobuchwepheshe.

data.translation: Iningi lezincazelo zokunquma kwezobuchwepheshe lihlanganyela imibono emibili ejwayelekile: ukuthi ukuthuthukiswa kobuchwepheshe uqobo kuhamba ngendlela engaphandle kakhulu kwethonya lezamasiko noma lezombusazwe, nokuthi ubuchwepheshe bubuye "bube nemiphumela" emphakathini ongokwemvelo, kunokuba ube nemibandela yezenhlalo.
data.original_reference: Izincazelo eziningi zenkolelo yokumiselwa okungokwezobuchwepheshe buhlanganyela imibono emibili evamile: ukuthi ukuthuthukiswa kwezobuchwepheshe ngokwakho kulandela indlela engaphezu kwethonya lesiko noma lepolotiki kakhulu, kanye nokuthi ezobuchwepheshe nazo "zinethonya" emiphakathini ezuzwayo ngokwemvelo, kunangezimo zenhlalo.
data.corrected_reference: Izincazelo eziningi zenkolelo yokumiselwa okungokwezobuchwepheshe buhlanganyela imibono emibili evamile: ukuthi ukuthuthukiswa kwezobuchwepheshe ngokwakho kulandela indlela engaphezu kwethonya lesiko noma lepolotiki kakhulu, kanye nokuthi ezobuchwepheshe nazo "nemithelela" emiphakathini ezuzwayo ngokwemvelo, kunangezimo zenhlalo.

data.translation: Ngokwesibonelo, umuntu angase athi izimoto zidingeka ukuba zikhuthaze ukuthuthukiswa kwemigwaqo.
data.original_reference: Ngokwesibonelo, othile angathi imoto iholela ekwakhiweni kwemigwaqo.
data.corrected_reference: Ngokwesibonelo, othile angathi imoto iholela ekwakhiweni kwemigwaqo.

data.translation: Nokho, inethiwekhi yomgwaqo kazwelonke ayinakwenzeka ngokwezomnotho ezimotweni ezimbalwa nje, ngakho kuthuthukiswa izindlela ezintsha zokukhiqiza ukuze kuncishiswe izindleko zokuthi umuntu abe nemoto.
data.original_reference: Nokho, imigwaqo exhumanisa izwe lonke ayizuzisi ngokomnotho ezimotweni ezimbalwa nje kuphela, ngakho izindlela ezintsha zokukhiqiza ziyenziwa ukunciphisa inani lokuba nemoto.
data.corrected_reference: Nokho, imigwaqo exhumanisa izwe lonke ayizuzisi ngokomnotho ezimotweni ezimbalwa nje kuphela, ngakho izindlela ezintsha zokukhiqiza ziyenziwa ukunciphisa inani lokuba nemoto.

data.translation: Ukuqashwa kwezimoto ngobuningi nakho kuholela ekutheni kube nezingozi eziningi emigwaqweni, okuholela ekutheni kusungulwe izindlela ezintsha zokunakekela impilo zokulungisa izidumbu ezilimele.
data.original_reference: Ukuba nezimoto kwabantu abaningi nakho kuholela ezigamekweni eziphakeme zezingozi emigwaqweni, okuholela ekusungulweni kwezindlela ezintsha kwezempilo zokulungisa imizimba elimele.

data.translation: Uthando lwalunezici eziningi zokunquma kwezenhlalo, olwaluthathwe kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, uFichte noSchlegel.
data.original_reference: Ezothando zinomthelela omkhulu ezinkolelweni zokuziphatha zamasiko, okuthathelwa kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, uFichte, kanye noSchlegel.
data.corrected_reference: I-Romanticism  yabanomthelela omkhulu ezinkolelweni zokuziphatha zamasiko, okuthathelwa kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, uFichte, kanye noSchlegel.

data.translation: Emlandweni weRomanticism, indawo yabumba abantu, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwavela amasiko namasiko ahlobene nale ndawo, futhi lokhu, ngokuvumelana nendawo yomphakathi, kwakukuhle kunemithetho eyanqunywa ngokuzithandela.
data.original_reference: Esizindeni seRomanticism, indawo ibumba abantu ngabanye, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi imikhuba nesiko ehlobene naleyo ndawo yavela, futhi lena, ivumelana nendawo yomphakathi, yayingcono kunemithetho emiswe ngokunganaki.
data.corrected_reference: Esizindeni seRomanticism, indawo ibumba abantu ngabanye, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi imikhuba nesiko ehlobene naleyo ndawo yavela, futhi lena, ivumelana nendawo yomphakathi, yayingcono kunemithetho emiswe ngokunganaki.

data.translation: Njengoba iParis yaziwa njengenhloko-dolobha yezemfashini yezwe lanamuhla, iConstantinople yayibhekwa njengenhloko-dolobha yemfashini yeYurophu yezwe.
data.original_reference: Ngendlela iParis eyaziwa ngayo njengenhlokodolobha yezwe lamanje, iConstantinople yayibhekwa njengenhlokodolobha yezikhonzi zaseYurophu.

data.translation: Ukulima okuzinzile kuyindlela elula, ngokuvamile eyokwemvelo, esebenzisa imbewu egcinwe endaweni yemvelo ehlangene nokujikeleza kwezitshalo noma ezinye izindlela ezilula zokwenza isivuno sibe sikhulu.
data.original_reference: Ukulimela ukuziphilisa indlela elula, ngovamile okususelwe ezintweni eziphilayo, kusetshenziswa imbewu egciniwe yasendaweni enezici ezingokwemvelo kuhlanganiswe nokushintshashintsha izilimo noma ezinye izindlela ezilula zokwenza umkhiqizo ube mningi.

data.translation: Amalungu amasiko angaphansi ngokuvamile abonisa ubulungu bawo ngokusebenzisa isitayela esiyingqayizivele nesingokomfanekiso, esihlanganisa imfashini, izindlela zokuziphatha, kanye ne-argot.

data.translation: Enye yezindlela ezivame kakhulu ezisetshenziselwa ukubonisa ukubaluleka kokuhlalisana nomphakathi ukusetshenziswa kwezenzakalo ezimbalwa ezibuhlungu zezingane ezazingahlalisani nabantu abadala ngenkathi zikhula, ngenxa yokunganaki, inhlekelele, noma ukuhlukunyezwa ngamabomu.
data.original_reference: Enye yezindlela eziningi kwezivamile ezisentshenziswa ukuchaza ukubaluleka kokuhlalisana nabanye ukusondelana nabambalwa ezinganeni, okwathi ngokunganakwa, ngeshwa, noma ngokuhlukunyezwa ngamabomu, bangajwayelaniswa nabantu abadala ngesikhathi besakhula.
data.corrected_reference: Enye yezindlela eziningi kwezivamile ezisentshenziswa ukuchaza ukubaluleka kokuhlalisana nabanye ukusondelana nabambalwa ezinganeni, okwathi ngokunganakwa, ngeshwa, noma ngokuhlukunyezwa ngamabomu, bangajwayelaniswa nabantu abadala ngesikhathi besakhula.

data.translation: Izingane ezinjalo zibizwa ngokuthi "zasendle" noma zasendle. Ezinye izingane zasendle ziye zavalelwa abantu (ngokuvamile abazali bazo); kwezinye izimo lokhu kushiywa kwengane kwakubangelwa ukwenqatshwa abazali ukukhubazeka okungokomzwelo noma ngokomzimba.
data.original_reference: Izingane ezinjalo zibizwa ngokuthi “zinobulwane” noma ezasendle. Ezinye izingane ezinobulwane zigcinwe abanye abantu (ngokuvamile abazali bazo); kwezinye izimo lokhu kulahlwa kwezingane kwakungenxa yokungamukeli komzali ukukhubazeka okukhulu ngokwengqondo noma ngokomzimba kwengane.

data.translation: Izingane zasendle kungenzeka zahlukunyezwa noma zahlukunyezwa ngaphambi kokuba zishiywe noma zibaleke.

data.translation: Abanye kuthiwa bakhuliswa izilwane; abanye kuthiwa bahlala endle bebodwa.

data.corrected_reference: Ezinye kuthiwa zikhuliswe izilwane; ezinye kuthiwa zihlale endle zizodwa.

data.translation: Lapho ikhuliswa ngokuphelele yizilwane ezingebona abantu, ingane yasendle ibonisa ukuziphatha (ngaphakathi kwemingcele yomzimba) okufana ngokuphelele nokwesilwane esikhathalelayo, njengokwesaba noma ukunganaki kwabantu.
data.original_reference: Lapho ikhuliswe ngokuphelele isilwane ekungesona umuntu, ingane enobulwane iveza ukuziphatha (ngokulinganiselwa okungokoqobo) cishe okufana ngokuphele nokwesilwane ebesiyinakekela, njengokusaba noma ukungabi nandaba nabantu.

data.translation: Nakuba ukufunda okusekelwe kumaphrojekthi kufanele kwenze ukufunda kube lula futhi kuthakazelise ngokwengeziwe, ukuhlela kuya ngaphesheya.
data.original_reference: Nakuba ukufunda okusekelwe kuyiphrojekthi kumelwe kwenze ukufunda kube lula futhi kuthakazelise kakhudlwana, izibhaxa zenza okwengeziwe.

data.translation: Ukubeka phansi akuyona indlela yokufunda kodwa kunalokho kuyisiza esihlinzeka ngosizo kubantu abafunda ulwazi olusha njengokusebenzisa uhlelo olusha lwe-computer noma ukuqala iphrojekthi entsha.

data.translation: Esigodini, kunzima ukuba imvelo ye-primate enezinhlelo zokugaya ukudla ezifana nezomuntu yanelise izidingo zayo zama-amino acid ezitholakala emithonjeni yezitshalo.
data.original_reference: Ngaphandle emahlathini, kunzima ngesilwane esinesimiso sokugaya ukudla esifana nesabantu ukwanelisa imfuneko yaso yama-amino-acid ngezitshalo ezikhona.

data.translation: Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukwehluleka ukwenza kanjalo kuneziphumo ezimbi: ukukhula okucindezelayo, ukungondleki kahle, futhi ekugcineni ukufa.
data.original_reference: Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukuhluleka ukwenza kanjalo kunemiphumela emibi kakhulu: ukungakhuli kahle, ukungondleki, kanye nokufa ngaphambi kwesikhathi.

data.translation: Izinsizakusebenza zezitshalo ezifinyeleleka kalula kwakuyoba amaprotheni atholakala emaqabungeni nasezihlahleni, kodwa lokhu kunzima ukuba izilwane eziphila ngaphansi komhlaba ezinjengathi zikugaya ngaphandle kokuba ziphekiwe.
data.original_reference: Imithombo yezitshalo etholakala kalula ngabe ngamaprotheni atholakala emaqabungeni nasezindimeni, kepha lezi zilukhuni kohlobo lokuqala njengathi ukugaya ngaphandle kokuthi luphekwe.

data.translation: Ngokuphambene nalokho, ukudla kwezilwane (izimpethu, ama-termites, amaqanda) akuyona nje into elula ukugayeka, kodwa kunikeza amaprotheni amaningi aqukethe wonke ama-amino acid abalulekile.
data.original_reference: Ngokuphambene, ukudla kwezilwane (izintuthwane, umuhlwa, amaqanda) akugayeki kalula nje kuphela, kodwa kunikeza amaphrotheni asezingeni eliphezulu anama-amino acid adingekayo.

data.translation: Uma sicabanga ngakho konke, akufanele kusimangaze ukuthi okhokho bethu baxazulula "inkinga yabo yamaprotheni" ngendlela efanayo neyabantu abanamaphiko ase savannah namuhla.

data.translation: Isikhungo sokuzindla kwaseTibetan yi-Deity Yoga, lapho amandla ahlanzwa khona, ama-chakra asetshenziswa futhi kuzalwa ulwazi lokuqonda.
data.original_reference: Isikhungo sokuzindla kwase-Tibet iYoga yesiThixo. Ngokubona ngeso lengqondo izithixo ezahlukahlukene imizila yamandla iba ehlanzekile, ama-chakra enziwa ukuthi asebenze futhi ukukhanya kokubakhona kuyakhiwa.

data.translation: IJalimane yayiyisitha esivamile eMpini Yezwe II, okwaholela ekusebenzisaneni phakathi kwe-USSR ne-US.E. Ekupheleni kwempi ukungqubuzana kwezinhlelo, izinqubo namasiko kwaholela ekuweni kwamazwe.
data.original_reference: Ijalimane bekuyisitha esivamile eMpini Yezwe 2, okwaholela ekusebenzisaneni phakathi kwe-USSR kanye neMelika. Ngokuphela kwempi ukungqubuzana kwezimiso, izinqubo kanye namasiko kwaholela ekubeni amazwe axabane.

data.translation: Ngo-September 17, 1939, ukuvikela kwase kuphelile futhi okuwukuphela kwethemba kwakuwukuhlukumeza futhi kuhlelwe kabusha emgqeni webhuloho laseRomania.
data.original_reference: NgoSepthemba 17, 1939, amabutho avikelayo wasePoland wayehlaselwe kakade, futhi ukuphela kwethemba kwakuwukuhlehla nokuhlela kabusha eceleni kwesihloko saseRomaniya.

data.translation: Kodwa lezi zinhlelo zaphelelwa yisikhathi cishe ngobusuku obunye, lapho amasosha angaphezu kuka-800 000 avela e-USSR Red Army engena futhi akha ama-front aseBelarus nase-Ukraine ngemuva kokuhlasela izifunda ezisempumalanga yePoland ngokwephulwa kweSivumelwano Sokuthula saseRiga, iSoviet-Poland Non-Aggression Pact, nezinye izivumelwano zomhlaba wonke, zombili eziseceleni neziseceleni.
data.original_reference: Nokho, lezi zinhlelo zaphelelwa yisikhathi cishe ngobusuku obubodwa, lapho amasosha angaphezu kuka-800,000 asuka kuyiSoviet's Union Red Army engena akha amabutho waseBelarussia kanye ne-Ukraine ngemva kokuhlasela izindawo ezingasempumalanga zasePoland ephula Isivumelwano Sokuthula seRiga, i-Soveiet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, kanye nezinye izivumelwane zamazwe onke zokuthula, kokubili zezizwe ezinxa-mbili kanye neziningi.
data.corrected_reference: Nokho, lezi zinhlelo zaphelelwa yisikhathi cishe ngobusuku obubodwa, lapho amasosha angaphezu kuka-800,000 asuka eSoviet's Union Red Army angena futhi akha amabutho waseBelarussia kanye ne-Ukraine ngemva kokuhlasela izindawo ezingasempumalanga zasePoland ephula Isivumelwano Sokuthula seRiga, i-Soveiet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, kanye nezinye izivumelwane zamazwe onke zokuthula, kokubili zezizwe ezinxa-mbili kanye neziningi.

data.translation: Esinye sezibonelo eziphawulekayo zakamuva salokhu kwakuwumkhankaso waseNyakatho ye-Atlantic weMpi Yezwe II lapho abaseMelika bezama ukuthutha amadoda nezinto ezibonakalayo ngaphesheya kwe-Atlantic Ocean ukuze basize iBrithani.

data.translation: Izimbuzi zasekhaya ngokuvamile zazigcinwa emihlambini eyayihambahamba ezintabeni noma kwezinye izindawo zokudla, ngokuvamile zifuywa abelusi bezimbuzi ababevame ukuba yizingane noma intsha, njengabelusi abaziwa kakhulu.

Lezi zindlela sokwalusa sisasentshenziswa nanamuhla.

data.translation: Nakuba imigwaqo yezinqola yayimane nje iqukethe amapulangwe ahambisanayo, yayivumela amahhashi ukuba awahudule ukuze afinyelele ijubane elikhulu futhi adonse imithwalo emikhulu kunemigwaqo eyindilinga kakhulu yangaleso sikhathi.

data.translation: Ukuhamba kokuqala okwaziwayo kwakuhamba, abantu baqala ukuhamba beqondile eminyakeni eyizigidi ezimbili edlule ngokuvela kweHomo Erectus (okusho ukuthi umuntu oqonde kahle).
data.original_reference: Indlela yokuqala yokuthatha uhambo eyaziwayo ukuhamba ngezinyawo, abantu baqala ukuhamba beqondile eminyakeni eyizigidi ezimbili edlule ngokuvela kwe-Homo Erectus (okusho umuntu ome waqonda).

data.translation: Abanduleli babo, i-Australopithecus, babengahambi beqondile njengokujwayelekile.
data.original_reference: Ababalandela esikhundleni, ama-Australopithecus bawangahambi ngendlela yokuma aqonde ngokujwayelekile.

data.translation: Ama-bipedal akhethekile atholakala kuma-Australopithecus amasha avela eminyakeni eyizigidi ezingu-4-2,3 edlule, nakuba kungenzeka ukuthi i-Sahelanthropus yayihamba ngezinyawo ezimbili eminyakeni eyizigidi ezingu-7 edlule.
data.original_reference: Okuchwepheshe ngokuba nyawo-mbili kutholakala emathanjeni aguquke itshe we-Australopithecus kusukela eminyakeni eyizigidi ezingu-4.2-3.9 edlule, nakuba ama-Sahelanthropus kungenzeka ayehamba ngezinyawo ezimbili ngaphambili kakhulu eminyakeni eyizigidi eziyisikhombisa edlule.

data.translation: Singaqala ukuphila ngendlela enobungane emvelweni, sijoyine ukunyakaza kwemvelo, futhi sibe yizishoshovu ukuze sinciphise ukuhlupheka esikhathini esizayo ngezinga elithile.
data.original_reference: Singaqala ukuphila singoni indawo esizungezile, singajoyina imikhankaso wendawo esizungezile, futhi singaba nangabalweli ukuze sinciphise ukuhlupheka kwesikhathi esizayo ngezinga elithile.
data.corrected_reference: Singaqala ukuphila ngobungane kakhulu nemvelo, singajoyina inhlangano yezemvelo, futhi singaba ngisho izishoshovu ukuze sinciphise ukuhlupheka okuzayo ngezinga elithile.

data.translation: Nokho, uma singafuni nje isixazululo sesikhashana, kufanele sithole impande yezinkinga, futhi sizivimbe.

data.translation: Kuyacaca ukuthi umhlaba ushintshe kakhulu ngenxa yentuthuko yesintu kwezesayensi nakwezobuchwepheshe, futhi izinkinga ziye zaba zinkulu ngenxa yokwanda kwabantu kanye nendlela yokuphila yabantu ephakeme.

data.translation: Ngemva kokwamukelwa yiCongress ngoJulayi 4, umqulu obhalwe ngesandla osayinwe nguMongameli weCongress uJohn Hancock kanye noNgqongqoshe uCharles Thomson wathunyelwa emigwaqweni embalwa kude nasendaweni yokunyathelisa kaJohn Dunlap.

data.translation: Inombolo enobumbano ingaba nenani elilodwa kuphela lamagugu amabili, okungukuthi u-0 noma u-1, futhi lezi zinombolo zibizwa ngokuthi izinombolo ezimbili - noma ama-bits, ukusebenzisa i-jargon yekhompyutha.
data.original_reference: Inombolo enziwe ngeziqu ezimbili ingaba nenani elilodwa kuphela kulawa amabili, okungukuthi u-0 noma u-1, futhi kubhekiselwa kulezinombolo ngokuthi amadijithi aneziqu ezimbili noma – noma ama-bit, uma kusetshenziswa ulimi lwasejele.
data.corrected_reference: Inombolo enziwe ngeziqu ezimbili ingaba nenani elilodwa kuphela kulawa amabili, okungukuthi u-0 noma u-1, futhi kubhekiselwa kulezinombolo ngokuthi amadijithi aneziqu ezimbili - noma ama-bit, ukusebenzisa ijagoni yekhompyutha.

data.translation: Izimpawu ezifana nokuhlanza zivamile ngokwanele ukuba kungabonwa ngokushesha.

data.translation: Isibonakaliso esihle kakhulu sokuthi kunobuthi bangaphakathi kungaba ukuba khona kwesitsha esivulekile semithi noma amakhemikhali anobuthi asekhaya.

data.corrected_reference: Isibonakaliso esihle kakhulu soshevu ovela ngaphakathi kungaba ukuba khona kwezitsha zemithi ezivulekile noma amakhemikhali wasendlini anobuthi.

data.translation: Hlola ilebula ukuze uthole imiyalo ethile yosizo lokuqala yalolo hlobo lwenkinga.
data.original_reference: Bheka ilebula ukuze ubone iziqondiso soziso lokuqala zalowo shevu.
data.corrected_reference: Bheka ilebula ukuze ubone iziqondiso soziso lokuqala zalowo shevu.

data.translation: Igama elithi bug lisetshenziswa izazi zezinambuzane ngomqondo ongokomthetho kuleli qembu lezinambuzane.
data.original_reference: Igama elithi isilwanyakazane lisetshenziswa izazi zezinambuzane ngendlela esemthethweni yaleli qembu lezi zinambuzane.
data.corrected_reference: Igama elithi isilwanyakazane lisetshenziswa izazi zezinambuzane ngendlela esemthethweni yaleli qembu lezi zinambuzane.

data.translation: Leli gama livela ekujwayelaneni kwasendulo nezinambuzane, ezizinambuzane ezivumelaniswe kahle nokushaya abantu izilokazane.
data.original_reference: Leli gama lidabuka ekujwayelaneni kwakudala neziMbungulu, okuyizilwanyana ezizifanelisela ngokuphila ngokudla emzimbeni wabantu.
data.corrected_reference: Leli gama lidabuka ekujwayelaneni kwakudala neziMbungulu, okuyizilwanyana ezizifanelisela ngokuphila ngokudla emzimbeni wabantu.

data.translation: Kokubili izinambuzane ezibulala abantu nezingekho embhedeni ziyizinambuzane ezizinzile, ezivumelanisiwe nokuhlala esibayeni noma endaweni yokuhlala yomninikhaya wazo.
data.original_reference: Zombili iZimbungulu eziphila ngezinye izinambuzane neZimbungulu ezivamile zihlala esidlekeni, zifanelekele ukuphila esidlekeni noma endaweni yokuhlala yesilwane ezincela igazi laso.

data.translation: E - United States of America, kunezimo ezingaba ngu - 400 000 ezaziwayo zesifo se - Multiple Sclerosis (MS), okwenza kube yisifo esiyinhloko se - neurological kubantu abadala abasebasha naphakathi.
data.original_reference: EMelika yonke kunesilinganiso sabantu abawu-400,000 okubikwe ukuthi bane-Multiple Sclerosis(MS), okuyishiya kuyisifo esiholayo sezinzwa kwabasebasha abakhulile nabakhulile abaseminyakeni ephakathi.

data.translation: I-MS yisifo esithinta uhlelo lwezinzwa olusezingeni eliphakeme, olwakhiwa ubuchopho, umgogodla kanye nenzwa ebonakalayo.
data.original_reference: I-MS isifo esithinta uhlelo lwezinzwa, olwenziwa ubuchopho, umfunkulu kanye nenzwa yokubona.
data.corrected_reference: I-MS isifo esithinta uhlelo lwezinzwa, olwenziwa ubuchopho, umfunkulu kanye nenzwa yokubona.

data.translation: Ucwaningo luthole ukuthi abesifazane banamathuba aphindwe kabili okuba ne-MS kunamadoda.
data.original_reference: Ucwaningo lubonise ukuthi abesifazane banamathuba akabili okuba neMS kunabesilisa.
data.corrected_reference: Ucwaningo lubonise ukuthi abesifazane banamathuba akabili okuba neMS kunabesilisa.

data.translation: Umbhangqwana ungase unqume ukuthi akukufanele ukukhulisa ingane.
data.original_reference: Abantu ababili abathandanayo bangabona kungenakubasiza, noma kusize ingane, ukukhulisa ingane.
data.corrected_reference: Abantu ababili abathandanayo bangabona kungenakubasiza, noma kusize ingane yawo, ukukhulisa ingane.

data.translation: Lezi zithandani zingase zikhethe ukwenza uhlelo lokutholwa kwengane yazo.
data.original_reference: Le mibhangqwana ingakhetha ukwenza uhlelo lokuthi ingane yabo itholwe abanye.
data.corrected_reference: Le mibhangqwana ingakhetha ukwenza uhlelo lokuthi ingane yabo itholwe abanye.

data.translation: Lapho izingane ziyamukelwa, abazali abazalwa nazo bayayeka ukuba abazali ukuze omunye umbhangqwana ube ngumzali wengane.
data.original_reference: Ekutholeni ingane enganabazali, abazali abayizalayo balahla amalungelo abo obuzali ukuze omunye umbhangqwana ube abazali bengane.
data.corrected_reference: Endabeni yokutholwa, abazali abazizalayo banqamula amalungelo abo okuba abazali ukuze omunye umbhangqwana ube umzali wengane.

data.translation: Injongo eyinhloko yesayensi ukuthola indlela umhlaba osebenza ngayo ngokusebenzisa indlela yesayensi. Le ndlela empeleni iqondisa ucwaningo oluningi lwesayensi.
data.original_reference: Umngomo oyinhloko wesayensi ukuthola indlela izwe elisebenza ngayo uma lisebenzisa indlela yesayensi. Le ndlela eqinisweni iqondisa oluningi ucwaningo lwesayensi.
