data.translation: Nokho, akuyona into eyodwa, ukuhlola, futhi ukuhlolwa kuyinto yokuhlola esetshenziselwa ukuqeda enye noma eziningi zezizathu ezingaba khona, ukubuza imibuzo, nokwenza ukubonwa nakho kuqondisa ucwaningo lwesayensi.
data.original_reference: Akukodwa nokho, ukulinga, futhi isilingo isivivinyo esisetshenziselwa ukususa ukucabangela okuhle okukodwa noma okwengeziwe, ukubuza imibuzo, nokwenza ukuphawula kanye nokuqondisa ucwaningo olungokwesayensi.
data.corrected_reference: Akukodwa nokho, ukulinga, futhi isilingo isivivinyo esisetshenziselwa ukususa ukucabangela okuhle okukodwa noma okwengeziwe, ukubuza imibuzo, nokwenza ukuphawula kanye nokuqondisa ucwaningo olungokwesayensi.

data.translation: Izazi zemvelo nezazi zefilosofi zazinaka kakhulu imibhalo yakudala futhi ikakhulukazi iBhayibheli lesiLatini.

data.corrected_reference: Izazi zemvelo kanye nezefilosofi zigxile emibhalweni yamandulo futhi, ngokukhethekile, eBhayibhelini ngesiLatin.

data.translation: Kwavunywa imibono ka-Aristotle ngazo zonke izindaba zesayensi, kuhlanganise nezengqondo.

data.translation: Izimiso eziningi ezibhekwayo eziqondiswa empilweni yomzimba nokuziphatha ngokuvamile zincike kakhulu ebukhoneni bemijikelezo engapheli nokukhiqizwa kwayo ngamawashi ezemvelo.
data.original_reference: Iningi lokuphindaphinda kuyifiziyoloji nasekuziphatheni okubonwayo ngokuvamile kuxhomeke ngokuyinhloko ekubeni khona kwemijikelezo evela phakathi kanye nokwenziwa kwako ngamawashi emvelo.

data.translation: Izimiso ezivamile, ezingeyona nje impendulo yezinkomba zangaphandle ezivamile, ziye zabhalwa kubantu abaningi abaphilayo, kuhlanganise namagciwane, ama-fungus, izitshalo nezilwane.
data.original_reference: Izigqi zezikhathi ezithile, okungekhona ukusabela nje kwezinkomba ezingaphandle, kubikiwe ezidalweni eziningi eziphilayo, kuhlanganise amabhakithiliya, isikhunta, izitshalo, kanye nezilwane.

data.translation: Amawashi ezinto eziphilayo angamasokhethi azigcina ezizishaya ezizoqhubeka nenkathi yokuhamba ngebhayisikili ngisho nalapho kungekho zinkomba zangaphandle.
data.original_reference: Amawashi endalo azivuselela amandla azoqhubeka esebenza emjikelwezweni okhululekile ngisho noma enkathini ongeke ukwazi ukuyicabanga.

data.translation: Izibonelo zemisebenzi yasendaweni zihlanganisa ukuzingela, ukudoba, ukuthatha izithombe, ukubuka izinyoni, nokuvakashela amapaki nokufunda ulwazi mayelana nemvelo.

data.translation: Kungani izinhlelo zokuhamba zenza izikhalazo ezinjalo, kungani zihluleka nsuku zonke? Ingabe onjiniyela bezokuhamba nje abakwazi ukwenza okuthile?

data.translation: Ukuhamba komgwaqo kuyinto yokufunda ukuhamba komshayeli ngamunye kanye nezimoto phakathi kwamaphoyinti amabili kanye nokuxhumana kwabo nomunye nomunye.

data.translation: Ngeshwa, ukufunda ukuhamba komgwaqo kunzima ngoba ukuziphatha komshayeli akunakubikezelwa ngokuqiniseka okungamaphesenti ayikhulu.

data.translation: Ngenhlanhla, abashayeli bavame ukuziphatha ngokulinganisela; ngakho-ke, ukuhamba komgwaqo kuvame ukuba nokuvumelana okuthile futhi kungenziwa ngokomfanekiso wezibalo.
data.original_reference: Ngenhlanhla, abashayeli bathambekele ekuziphatheni ngendlela ecishe ifane; ngakho ukuminyana kwezimoto kuthambekele ekufaneni futhi cishe kungafanekiswa ngokwezibalo.

data.translation: Ukuze kuboniswe kangcono ukuhamba komgwaqo, kuye kwasungulwa ubudlelwano phakathi kwezici ezintathu eziyinhloko: (1) ukuhamba, (2) ubukhulu, kanye (3) ijubane.

data.translation: U - Aristotle, isazi sefilosofi, wathi yonke into yakhiwa ingxube yezinto ezine - umhlaba, amanzi, umoya nomlilo.

data.translation: Lokhu kwakufana kakhulu nezimo ezine zendaba (ngokulandelana okufanayo): eziqinile, eziwuketshezi, eziyigesi ne-plasma, nakuba futhi wayecabanga ukuthi ziyashintsha zibe izinto ezintsha ukuze zakheke lokho esikubonayo.

data.translation: Lezi zimfundiso zisho ukuthi abantu banezidingo nezifiso ezithile eziye zahlanganiswa lapho bevuthwa baze babe abantu abadala.

data.translation: Lolu hlobo lomphathi luthola kunzima ukwenza izinqumo ezingavamile, ukwenza izenzo zokuyala, ukuhlola ukusebenza, ukupha abantu umthwalo wemfanelo, nokuziphendulela.

data.translation: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, umuntu uba umuntu ongaqondakali ocabanga ukuthi kumelwe ashintshe konke iqembu elikufezile futhi akwenze okwalo.

data.translation: Emaphethelweni eMedina endala kulula ukuthola izindawo ezithengisa izimpahla zendabuko zaseMorocco, njenge-tagine, i-ceramics, izimpahla zesikhumba, ama-hookah, kanye nemikhiqizo eminingi ye-gegaws, kodwa konke kungenxa yezivakashi.

data.translation: Ngo-2002 iGoma yabhujiswa i-lava evela entabeni yaseNyiragongo eyamngcwaba ingxenye enkulu yemigwaqo yedolobha, ikakhulukazi enkabeni yedolobha.

data.translation: Nakuba iGoma iphephile, noma yikuphi ukuvakashelwa ngaphandle kweGoma kufanele kuhlolwe ukuze kuqondwe isimo sezimpi eziqhubeka esifundazweni saseNyakatho Kivu.

data.translation: I-Oyapock River Bridge iyibhuloho eliqhutshwa izintambo elihlanganisa imizi yase-Oiapoque eBrazil neSaint-Georges de l' Oyapock eFrench Guiana.

data.translation: Lezi zinqaba ezimbili ziphakame ngamamitha angama-83 ubude bazo bufinyelela kumamitha angama-378 ububanzi bazo bufinyelela kumamitha angu-3,50.
data.original_reference: Imibhoshongo emibili iphakama ngamamitha angu-83, ingamamitha angu-378 ubude futhi inemigwaqo emibili engu-3.50 m ububanzi.

data.translation: Umngcele ophakeme ngaphansi kwebhuloho ungamamitha angu-15. Ukwakhiwa kwaqedwa ngo-Agasti 2011, akuvulelwanga ukugibela kuze kube ngo-March 2017.
data.original_reference: Isikhala sokuphakama esisalayo ngaphansi kwebhuloho singamamitha angu-15. Ukulakha kwaphela ngo-Agasti 2011, alivulwanga ukuze kuhambe izimoto kwaze kwaba uMashi 2017.
data.corrected_reference: Isikhala sokuphakama esisalayo ngaphansi kwebhuloho singamamitha angu-15. Ukulakha kwaphela ngoNcwaba 2011, alivulwanga ukuze kuhambe izimoto kwaze kwaba uNdasa 2017.

data.translation: Kulindeleke ukuthi leli bhuloho liqale ukusebenza ngokugcwele ngo-September 2017 lapho kulindeleke ukuthi kuqedwe ukuhlolwa kwezimpahla zaseBrazil.
data.original_reference: Ibhuloho lihlelelwe ukusebenza ngokugcwele ngoSeptemba 2017, lapho izindawo zaseBrazil zokuhlola abangenayo kulindelwe ukuthi ziphele.
data.corrected_reference: Ibhuloho lihlelelwe ukusebenza ngokugcwele ngoMandulo 2017, lapho izindawo zaseBrazil zokuhlola abangenayo kulindelwe ukuthi ziphele.

data.translation: AmaGuarani ayeyiqembu eliyinhloko lezizwe ezihlala endaweni manje eseMpumalanga yeParaguay, eziphila njengabazingeli abangama-nomadic ababuye basebenzise ezolimo zokuphila.

data.translation: Ngekhulu le-16 iParaguay, eyayike yabizwa ngokuthi "Isifundazwe Esikhulu SaseNdiya", yazalwa ngenxa yokuhlangana kwabanqobi baseSpain namaqembu omdabu.

data.original_reference: Imali ingashintshwa ebhange okuwukuphela kwalo esiqhingini esiseStanley ngaphesheya kwesitolo saseFIC Ntshonalanga.
data.corrected_reference: Imali ingashintshwa ebhange okuwukuphela kwalo esiqhingini esiseStanley ngaphesheya kwesitolo saseFIC Ntshonalanga.

data.translation: Ama-pound aseBrithani ngokuvamile ayokwamukelwa noma kuphi eziqhingini futhi ngaphakathi kwamakhadi esikweletu aseStanley kanye namadola aseMelika nawo ayamukelwa njalo.
data.original_reference: Amaphawundi wase-Britain ngokuvamile azokwamukelwa noma yikuphi eziqhingini futhi nangaphakathi amakhadi wesikweletu e-Stanley kanye namadola ase-United States nawo ajwayele ukwamukelwa.

data.translation: Ezingxenyeni ezikude zezilwandle kungenzeka ukuthi ngeke zamukelwe amakhadi esikweletu, nakuba kungathathwa imali yaseBrithani neyase-United States; hlola kusengaphambili nabanikazi ukuze uthole ukuthi iyiphi indlela yokukhokha eyamukelekayo.
data.original_reference: Eziqhingini eziqhelile amakhadi wokuthenga ngesikweletu cishe ngeke amukelwe, nakuba imali yaseBrithani naseMelika ingathathwa; hlola nabanikazi kusengaphambili ukuthola ukuthi iyiphi indlela yokukhokha eyamukelwayo.
data.corrected_reference: Eziqhingini eziqhelile amakhadi wokuthenga ngesikweletu cishe ngeke amukelwe, nakuba imali yaseBrithani naseMelika ingathathwa; hlola nabanikazi kusengaphambili ukuthola ukuthi iyiphi indlela yokukhokha eyamukelwayo.

data.translation: Cishe akunakwenzeka ukushintshanisa imali yaseFalklands ngaphandle kweziqhingi, ngakho-ke shintshanisa imali ngaphambi kokuba ushiye lezi ziqhingi.
data.original_reference: Cishe akwenzeki ukushintshelana imali yaseFalklands ngaphandlwe kweziqhingi, ngakho-ke shintshelana imali ngaphambi kokuhamba eziqhingini.

data.translation: IMontevideo isezindaweni ezisezindaweni ezishisayo; ezinyangeni zasehlobo izinga lokushisa elingaphezu kuka - 30 ° C livame kakhulu.

data.translation: Ubusika bungababanda ngendlela engakholeki: amazinga okushisa ayaqabukela abe ngaphansi kwengqele, kodwa umoya nomswakama kuhlangene ukuze uzizwe ubanda kunalokho okushiwo yi-thermometer.
data.original_reference: Ubusika bungaba nzima kakhulu: amazing okushisa angase adlulele ngale kweqhwa, kodwa umoya kanye nomswakama sekuhlangene kwenza kubande ngaphezu kwalokho isikali sokushisa esikushoyo.

data.translation: Nakuba izilwane eziningi zasemapaki zivame ukubona abantu, izilwane zasendle zisahlala ziluhlaza futhi akufanele zondliwe noma ziphazamiseke.

data.translation: Ngokombiko weziphathimandla zepaki, gcina okungenani amamitha angu-100 kude nezinyoni nezimpisi namamitha angu-25 kude nazo zonke ezinye izilwane zasendle!
data.original_reference: Ngokweziphathimandla zepaki, hlala okungenani amayadi/amamitha angu-100 kude namabhere kanye nezimpisi ezifana namanketshane futhi amayadi/amamitha angu-25 kude nezinye izilwane zasendle!

data.translation: Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi zibukeka zinobuntu obungakanani, izilwane ezinjengamabhisoni, ama-elks, ama-elks, amabhere, cishe zonke izilwane ezinkulu zingase zihlasele.
data.original_reference: Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi zibukeka zithobile kangakanani, izinyathi zaseMelika, ama-elk, ama-moose, amabhere, futhi cishe nazo zonke izilwane ezinkulu zingahlasela.
data.corrected_reference: Kungakhathelekile ukuthi zibukeka zithobile kangakanani, izinyathi, ama-elk, ama-moose, amabhere, futhi cishe nazo zonke izilwane ezinkulu zingahlasela.

data.translation: Njalo ngonyaka, izivakashi eziningi ziyalimala ngoba zingagcini ibanga elifanele. Lezi zilwane zinkulu, zasendle, futhi zingaba yingozi, ngakho zinike indawo yazo.
data.original_reference: Unyaka ngamunye, izivakashi eziningi ziyalimala ngenxa yokuthi azigcinanga ibanga elifanele. Lezi zilwane zinkulu, ezasendle, futhi zingaba ingozi, ngakho zinike isikhala sazo.
data.corrected_reference: Unyaka ngamunye, izivakashi eziningi ziyalimala ngenxa yokuthi azigcinanga ibanga elifanele. Lezi zilwane zinkulu, ezasendle, futhi zingaba ingozi, ngakho zinike isikhala sazo.

data.translation: Ngaphezu kwalokho, qaphela ukuthi iphunga liyakhanga amabhere nezinye izilwane zasendle, ngakho gwema ukuthwala noma ukupheka ukudla okunamakha futhi ugcine ikamu lihlanzekile.
data.original_reference: Ngaphezu kwalokho, phawula ukuthi iphunga libiza amabhere kanye nezinye izilwane zasendle, ngakho gwema ukuphatha noma ukupheka ukudla okunephunga futhi ugcine ikamu lihlanzekile.
data.corrected_reference: Ngaphezu kwalokho, phawula ukuthi iphunga libiza amabhere kanye nezinye izilwane zasendle, ngakho gwema ukuphatha noma ukupheka ukudla okunephunga futhi ugcine ikamu lihlanzekile.

data.translation: Kwabase-Australia, umqondo wekhofi elimhlophe elivulekile awubalulekile. Umnyama omfishane yi-espresso, i-cappuccino ihlanganiswe ukhilimu (hhayi i-foam) futhi itiye lisetshenziswa ngaphandle kobisi.

data.translation: Ukubhuka kusengaphambili kunikeza isihambi ukuthula kwengqondo ukuthi bayoba nendawo yokulala lapho sebefikile lapho beya khona.

data.translation: Izikhangibavakashi zivame ukubhuka amahhotela athile, nakuba ungase ukwazi ukubhuka ezinye izinhlobo zokuhlala, njengamabala okuhlalisa, ngokusebenzisa i-ejenti yezokuvakasha.
data.original_reference: Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo kaningi ziba nezaphulelo namahhotela athile, nakuba ungakwazi ukubhukha ezinye izinhlobo zokuhlala, njengendawo yamakamu, ngenkampani ehlela uhambo.
data.corrected_reference: Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo kaningi ziba nezaphulelo namahhotela athile, nakuba ungakwazi ukubhukha ezinye izinhlobo zokuhlala, njengendawo yamakamu, ngenkampani ehlela uhambo.

data.translation: Ama-ejenti ezokuvakasha ngokuvamile anikela ngamaphakheji ahlanganisa ukudla kwasekuseni, amalungiselelo ezokuthutha aya / avela esikhumulweni sezindiza noma ngisho namaphakheji ezindiza nezamahhotela ahlanganisiwe.
data.original_reference: Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo zinikeza inhlanganisela yezinto ezihlanganisa ibhulakufesi, amalungiselelo wezinto zokuthutha zokuya/zokusuka esikhumulweni sezindiza noma isethi ehlangene yendiza kanye nehhotela.
data.corrected_reference: Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo zinikeza inhlanganisela yezinto ezihlanganisa ibhulakufesi, amalungiselelo wezinto zokuthutha zokuya/zokusuka esikhumulweni sezindiza noma isethi ehlangene yendiza kanye nehhotela.

data.translation: Bangase futhi bakugcinele ukubhuka uma udinga isikhathi sokucabanga ngesipho noma ukuthola eminye imibhalo lapho uya khona (isb. i-visa).

data.translation: Noma iziphi izichibiyelo noma izicelo kufanele ziqale zidluliselwe kumenzeli wezokuvakasha hhayi ngqo ehhotela.

data.translation: Kwezinye imikhosi, iningi labantu abahambela imikhosi yomculo linquma ukwakha ikamu endaweni yalo, futhi iningi labantu elihambelayo libheka lokhu njengengxenye ebalulekile yokuhlangenwe nakho.

data.translation: Nokho, ukuphuza ngokweqile kwenza umuntu angabi nabulungisa futhi bonke abagembuli abahle bayazi ukuthi kubalulekile ukuhlala benengqondo.

data.translation: I-Safaris mhlawumbe iyindawo enkulu kunazo zonke ezokuvakasha e-Afrika futhi iyindawo evelele yezivakashi eziningi.

data.translation: I-safari ehamba ngezinyawo (ebizwa nangokuthi i- "bush walk", "hiking safari", noma "walking ") iqukethe ukuhamba ngezinyawo, kungaba amahora ambalwa noma izinsuku eziningana.

data.translation: Ama-Paralympics azoba phakathi kuka-Agasti 24 no-September 5 2021. Eminye imicimbi izobanjelwa kwezinye izindawo kulo lonke elaseJapan.

data.translation: Umzila ophakathi kwePpoint Marion neFairmont unikeza izimo eziyinselele kakhulu zokushayela emgwaqweni omkhulu iBuffalo - Pittsburgh, odlula kaningi ezindaweni ezihlukanisiwe ezihlathi.

data.translation: Uma ungakajwayele ukushayela emigwaqweni yasemaphandleni, qaphela: amabanga agxilile, imigwaqo emincane, kanye nezigodi ezicijile zibusa.

data.translation: Imingcele yesivinini esishiwo iphansi kakhulu kunasezigabeni zangaphambilini nezangemva kwalokho ngokuvamile 35-40 mph (56-64 km / h) futhi ukulalela okuqinile kuyo kubaluleke kakhulu kunangaphambili.

data.translation: ICochamo Valley - indawo eyinhloko yaseChile yokugibela izintaba, eyaziwa ngokuthi iYosemite yaseNingizimu Melika, enezindonga ezinkulu namatshe amakhulu agqwaliwe.

data.translation: Izinkundla eziphakeme zibandakanya ukubuka okuhlaba umxhwele okuvela eziqongweni, abagibeli abavela kuzo zonke izingxenye zomhlaba basungula izindlela ezintsha phakathi kwamandla alo angenamkhawulo ezindonga.
data.original_reference: Iziqongo zihlanganisa izindawo zokubona izindawo ezinhle kakhulu ezihlokweni. Abagibeli abavela kuzo zonke izingxenye zomhlaba bayaqhubeka ngokuthola imizila emisha phakathi kwezindawo ezingapheli ezingaba izindonga.

data.translation: Ezemidlalo yeqhwa ehla esiqongweni sezintaba, ezihlanganisa ukugibela ama-ski nokugibela ama-snowboard, ziyizemidlalo ethandwa kakhulu ehlanganisa ukugibela ama-ski noma i-snowboard ehlanganiswe nezinyawo zakho.
data.original_reference: Izikhukhula zehle, okubandakanya skiing futhi manjehibilika eqhweni iyimidlalo ethandwayo efaka ukwehlela phansi indawo embozwe yiqhwa nge skis noma ibhodi leqhwa elinanyathe izinyawo zakho.
data.corrected_reference: Imidlalo yeqhwa ekwehleni, ehlanganisa ukushushuluza eqhweni ne-snowboarding, imidlalo edumile ehlanganisa ukuslayida phansi endaweni embozwe yiqhwa ngama-skis noma ibhodi leqhwa elinamathiselwe ezinyaweni zakho.

data.translation: Ukugibela ama-ski kuyinto enkulu yokuhamba nabantu abaningi abathanda ukugibela ama-ski, ngezinye izikhathi ababizwa ngokuthi "ama-ski bums," abahlela amaholide aphelele ezungeze ukugibela ama-ski endaweni ethile.
data.original_reference: Ukushushuluza eqhweni umsebenzi oyinhloko wokuhamba onabashisekeli abaningi, kwezinye izikhathi abaziwa ngokuthi "ama-ski bums," abahlela ukuvakasha konke ukuze bashushuluze eqhweni endaweni ethile.
data.corrected_reference: Ukushushuluza eqhweni umsebenzi omkhulu wokuhamba onabashisekeli abaningi, kwezinye izikhathi abaziwa ngokuthi ama-"ski bums," abahlela ukuvakasha konke ukuze bashushuluze eqhweni endaweni ethile.

data.translation: Umqondo wokushushuluza uyisithombe sasendulo kakhulu semidwebo yemihume ebonisa abantu abahamba ngesikini esukela ku-5000 BC!

data.translation: Ukugibela ama-ski phansi njengendlela yomdlalo kuqala okungenani ngekhulu le-17 leminyaka, futhi ngo-1861 iqembu lokuqala lokugibela ama-ski lavulwa abaseNorway e-Australia.
data.original_reference: Ukushushuluza eqhweni wehla entabeni njengomhlalo kuhlehlela emuva okungenani ekhulwini lama-17 leminyaka, futhi ngo-1861 iqembu lokushushuluza eqhweni kokuzilibazisa lavulwa abantu baseNorway e-Australia.

data.translation: Ukuhamba ngesikebhe: Le nqubo ibizwa nangokuthi ukugibela ngesikebhe, ukugibela ama-ski noma ukuhamba ngesikebhe.
data.original_reference: Ukushushuluza eqhweni ngesikhwama: Lokhu kubuye kubizwe ngokuthi ukushushuluza eqhweni emaphandleni, ukubona indawo ngokushushulaza eqhweni kanye nokushushuluza eqhweni kokuqwala izintaba.

data.translation: Kuhlobene kodwa ngokuvamile akubandakanyi ukuhamba nge-ski noma ukugibela izintaba ngendlela yase-Alpine, okulandelayo okwenziwe endaweni eqinile futhi okudinga ama-ski namabhuzu aqinile kakhulu.

data.translation: Ezimweni ezinhle uzokwazi ukuhamba amabanga amakhulu kunokuhamba ngezinyawo kodwa akuvamile ukuba uthole isivinini sokushushuluza ngaphandle kwesikhwama esindayo emigwaqweni elungisiwe.

data.translation: IYurophu iyizwekazi elincane kodwa elinabantu abaningi abazimele, futhi ngaphansi kwezimo ezivamile, ukuhamba emazweni amaningi kwakuyosho ukuthi kufanele kudlule izicelo ze-visa kanye nokuhlolwa kwepasipoti izikhathi eziningi.
data.original_reference: IYurophu izwekali elincane ngokwesilinganiso kodwa elinamazwe amaningi azimele. Ngaphansi kwezimo ezivamile, ukuthatha uhambo emazweni amaningana kungasho ukubhalisela i-visa kanye nokudlula lapho kuhlolwa khona amaphasiphoti kaningana.

data.translation: Ukushaqeka kokungena kabusha kwenzeka ngokushesha kunokukushaqeka kwesiko (kunesikhathi esincane sezinyanga zenyosi), kuqhubeka isikhathi eside, futhi kungaba nzima kakhulu.
data.original_reference: Ukuthuka ngoba usekhaya kuza kuqala kunalokho kuthuka okwenzeka uma uvakashele endaweni ongayazi (ngakho ukujabula kuba kuncane), kuthathe isikhathi, futhi kungaya ngokuya kwande.
data.corrected_reference: Ukuthuka ngoba usekhaya kuza kuqala kunalokho kuthuka okwenzeka uma uvakashele endaweni ongayazi (kunesigaba esincane se-honeymoon), kuthathe isikhathi, futhi kungaya ngokuya kwande.

data.translation: Abahambi ababenokulula ukuzivumelanisa namasiko amasha ngezinye izikhathi bakuthola kunzima kakhulu ukujwayela amasiko endawo yabo.
data.original_reference: Izihambi ezikuthole kulula ukujwayela isiko elisha kwesinye isikhathi zikuthola kunzima ukujwayela isiko lazo lendabuko futhi.
data.corrected_reference: Izihambi ezikuthole kulula ukujwayela isiko elisha kwesinye isikhathi zikuthola kunzima ukujwayela isiko lazo lendabuko futhi.

data.translation: Lapho ubuyela ekhaya ngemva kokuhlala phesheya, uye wajwayela isiko elisha futhi ulahlekelwe ezinye zezimiso zakho ezivela emasikweni asekhaya.
data.original_reference: Lapho ubuyela ekhaya usuka phesheya, kuzodingeka ujwayele isiko elisha neminye yemikhuba yakho oyilahlile kusukela ezweni lakini.
data.corrected_reference: Lapho ubuyela ekhaya usuka phesheya, kuzodingeka ujwayele isiko elisha neminye yemikhuba yakho oyilahlile kusukela ezweni lakini.

data.translation: Lapho uqala ukuya phesheya, abantu cishe babekezela futhi beqonda, bazi ukuthi abahambi ezweni elisha kudingeka bazivumelanise nalo.
data.original_reference: Lapho uya phesheya okokuqala, abantu kungenzeka ukuthi babebekezela futhi beqonda, bazi ukuthi izivakashi uma zifika ezweni elisha zidinga ukujwayela.
data.corrected_reference: Lapho uya phesheya okokuqala, abantu kungenzeka ukuthi babebekezela futhi beqonda, bazi ukuthi izivakashi uma zifika ezweni elisha zidinga ukujwayela.

data.translation: Abantu bangase bangalindele ukuthi ukubekezela nokuqonda kuyadingeka nakwabahambi ababuyela ekhaya.
data.original_reference: Abantu kungezeka bangalindeli ukuthi ukulinda kanye nokuqonda nakho kubalulekile ezivakashini ezibuyela ekhaya.
data.corrected_reference: Abantu kungezeka bangalindeli ukuthi ukulinda kanye nokuqonda nakho kubalulekile ezivakashini ezibuyela ekhaya.

data.translation: Umbukiso wezwi nokukhanya we-Pyramid ungenye yezinto ezithakazelisa kakhulu kule ndawo ezinganeni.
data.original_reference: Umbukiso onxa-ntathu womsindo nokukhanya ungenye yezinto ezithakazelisayo endaweni yezingane.
data.corrected_reference: Umbukiso onxa-ntathu womsindo nokukhanya ungenye yezinto ezithakazelisayo endaweni yezingane.

data.translation: Ungabona amaphiramidi ebumnyameni futhi ungawabona ethule ngaphambi kokuqala kombukiso.

data.translation: Ngokuvamile lapha uhlala uzwa umsindo wabavakashi nabathengisi.

data.translation: Izithombe ziboniswe emaphirejidi futhi amaphirejidi ahlukahlukene akhanyisiwe.

data.translation: Iziqhingi zaseSouth Shetland, ezatholakala ngo-1819, zibizwa izizwe eziningana futhi zinamasisekelo amaningi, eziyishumi nesithupha ezisebenzayo ngo-2020.

data.translation: Lesi siqhingi sitholakala ngamakhilomitha angu-120 enyakatho yeNhlonhlo, esikhulu kunazo zonke yiKing George Island lapho kuhlala khona iVilla Las Estrellas.
data.original_reference: I-archipelago isendaweni eqhele ngamakhilomitha angu-120 enyakatho yeNhlonhlo. Enkulu kuwo i-King George enendawo e-Villa Las Estrellas.
data.corrected_reference: I-archipelago isendaweni eqhele ngamakhilomitha angu-120 enyakatho yeNhlonhlo. Enkulu kuwo i-King George enendawo e-Villa Las Estrellas.

data.translation: Ezinye zihlanganisa iLivingston Island, neDeception lapho i- caldera ecekelwe phansi yentaba-mlilo esebenza khona inikeza khona itheku lemvelo elimangalisayo.
data.original_reference: Okunye kuhlanganisa isiqhingi seLivingston, kanye neDeception lapho imbobo enkulu egcwele udaka lwentabamlilo esaphuquka umlilo yenza itheku elimangalisayo elingokwemvelo.
data.corrected_reference: Okunye kuhlanganisa isiqhingi seLivingston, kanye neDeception lapho imbobo enkulu egcwele udaka lwentabamlilo esaphuquka umlilo yenza itheku elimangalisayo elingokwemvelo.

data.translation: I-Ellsworth Land iyisifunda esiseningizimu yeNhlonhlo, esilinganiswe uLwandle lwaseBellingshausen.
data.original_reference: IZwe lase-Ellsworth liyindawo eseningizimu neNhlonhlo, likhawuliswe uLwandle iBellingshausen.
data.corrected_reference: IZwe lase-Ellsworth liyindawo eseningizimu neNhlonhlo, likhawuliswe uLwandle iBellingshausen.

data.translation: Izintaba zeNhlonhlo lapha zijoyina indawo enesifunda, bese ziphinde ziphinde ziphakame ukuze zakheke uchungechunge lwamakhilomitha angu-360 lwezintaba zase-Ellsworth, olwahlulahlulwa yiMinnesota Glacier.
data.original_reference: Izintaba zeNhlonhlo zihlangana enkangaleni, bese zihlangana futhi ukwakha uchungechunge lweziNtaba sase-Ellsworth, ezinqunywa phakathi yiGilesiya yase-Minnesota.
data.corrected_reference: Izintaba zeNhlonhlo lapha zihlangana ethafeni, bese ziphinde ziqhamuke ukuze zenze uchungechunge lwe-360 km lwezintaba zase-Ellsworth, ezihlukaniswe kabili yi-Minnesota Glacier.

data.translation: Ingxenye esenyakatho noma i-Sentinel Range inezintaba eziphakeme kakhulu e-Antarctica, i-Vinson Massif, ephakeme ngamamitha angu-4892 iNtaba iVinson.
data.original_reference: Ingxenye engasenyakatho noma iSentinel Range inezintaba eziphakeme kunazo zonke zase-Antarctica, iVinson Massif, ephakeme yaba ngu-4892 m iMount Vinson.

data.translation: Ezindaweni ezikude, ngaphandle kokubukwa ngocingo lweselula, kungenzeka ukuthi ukuphela kwendlela ongakhetha ngayo ifoni yesathelayithi.
data.original_reference: Ezindaweni ezikude, ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi yefoni esebenzayo, ifoni yesiphuphutheki kungaba yiyo kuphela into ongayisebenzisa.
data.corrected_reference: Ezindaweni ezikude, ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi yefoni esebenzayo, ucingo lwesathelayithi lungaba yiyo kuphela into ongayisebenzisa.

data.translation: Ngokuvamile umakhalekhukhwini awushintshi umakhalekhukhwini, ngoba kumelwe ube ngaphandle nombono ocacile womakhalekhukhwini ukuze wenze ucingo.
data.original_reference: Ifoni ye-satellite ngokuvamile ayithatheli ifoni ephathwayo indawo, njengoba kudingeka ube ngaphandle uqondene nesiphuphutheki ukuze ushaye ucingo.
data.corrected_reference: Ucingo lwesathelayithi ngokuvamile ayithatheli ifoni ephathwayo indawo, njengoba kudingeka ube ngaphandle uqondene nesiphuphutheki ukuze ushaye ucingo.

data.translation: Le nsizakalo ivame ukusetshenziswa yizikhangibavakashi, kuhlanganise nezikhangibavakashi, kanye nezinkampani ezifuna ukufinyelela kude kwedatha nezwi.
data.original_reference: Isevisi isetshenziswa kaningi yimikhumbi, kubandakanya umsebenzi wobungcweti, kanye nohambo olunezidingo zedatha nezwi elikude.
data.corrected_reference: Isevisi isetshenziswa kaningi yimikhumbi, kubandakanya umsebenzi wobungcweti, kanye nohambo olunezidingo zedatha nezwi elikude.

data.translation: Umhlinzeki wakho wezinsizakalo zocingo wendawo kufanele akwazi ukunikeza ulwazi oluthe xaxa mayelana nokuxhuma kule nkonzo.

data.corrected_reference: Inkampani yezingcingo yangakini kumelwe ikwazi ukukunikeza imininingwane engeziwe mayelana nokuxhuma kulolu hlelo.

data.translation: Ukukhetha okuya ngokuya kuthandwa kakhulu kulabo abahlela unyaka ongenamkhawulo ukuhamba nokufunda.

data.translation: Lokhu kuthandwa kakhulu yilabo abaphumele esikoleni, kubavumela ukuba bahambe unyaka ngaphambi kweyunivesithi, ngaphandle kokuphazamisa imfundo yabo.

data.translation: Ezimweni eziningi, ukubhalisa izifundo zangaphandle kungakusiza ukuba uthuthukise amathuba akho okuya emfundweni ephakeme ezweni lakini.

data.translation: IFinland iyindawo enhle yokuhamba ngesikebhe. "Izwe lamachibi ayinkulungwane" linezinkulungwane zeziqhingi, emachibi naseziqhingini ezisogwini.

data.translation: Nakuba iziqhingi ezisogwini namachibi amakhulu ngempela maningi ngokwanele ukuba kuhlale noma iyiphi i - yacht, izikebhe ezincane noma ngisho ne - kayak zinikeza okuhlangenwe nakho okuhlukile.

data.translation: Kwabanye, ukuqonda okuthile ngendlela izindiza ezisebenza ngayo nokuthi kwenzekani ngenkathi zindiza kungasiza ekunqobeni ukwesaba okusekelwe kokungaziwa noma ekungakwazi ukulawula.
data.original_reference: Kwabanye abantu, ukuzwisisa okuthile kokuthi indiza isebenza kanjani nokuthi kwenzekani phakathi nokundiza kungabasiza ukuthi banqobe ukwesaba okusekelwe ezintweni ezingaziwa noma ukungaphathi izintambo.

data.translation: Izinkampani zokuthumela izincwadi zikhokhelwa kahle uma ziletha izinto ngokushesha, ngokuvamile isikhathi sibaluleke kakhulu uma kuziwa emibhalweni yebhizinisi, izimpahla noma izingxenye ezisele ukuze kulungiswe ngokushesha.
data.original_reference: Izinkampani ezithutha impahla zikhokhelwa kahle ngokuthumela impahla ngokushehsa. Ngokuvamile, isikhathi sibalulekile ngamaphepha ebhizinisi, impahla ethengwayo ukuze idayiswe noma enye impahla edingekayo ukuze kwenziwe ukulungisa okusheshayo.
data.corrected_reference: Izinkampani ezithutha impahla zikhokhelwa kahle ngokuthumela impahla ngokushehsa. Ngokuvamile, isikhathi sibalulekile ngamaphepha ebhizinisi, impahla ethengwayo ukuze idayiswe noma enye impahla edingekayo ukuze kwenziwe ukulungisa okusheshayo.

data.translation: Kwezinye izindlela, izinkampani ezinkulu zinezindiza zazo, kodwa kwezinye izindlela nezinkampani ezincane kwakukhona inkinga.
data.original_reference: Kwezinye izindlela, izinkampani ezinkudlwana zinezindiza zazo, kodwa kwezinye izindlela nezinkampani ezincane bekunezinkinga.

data.translation: Uma izinto zithunyelwa ngendiza, kwezinye izindlela kungase kuthathe izinsuku ukuba zidlule ekuthuthweni nasezindalini.
data.original_reference: Uma bebathumele zonke izinto ngebhanoyi, kwezinye izindlela bekuzothatha izinsuku ukwehlisa imithwalo nokudlula kwabahlola amaphepha.
data.corrected_reference: Uma bebathumele zonke izinto ngebhanoyi, kwezinye izindlela bekuzothatha izinsuku ukwehlisa imithwalo nokudlula kwabahlola amaphepha.

data.translation: Ukuphela kwendlela yokuhamba ngokushesha kwakuwukuba uthumele umthwalo ohlosiwe.
data.original_reference: Indlela elula yokuyingenisa ngokushesha ukuthi uyithumele njengomthwalo ohloliwe. Imithetho yezinkampani zezindiza angeke ibavumele ukuthumela umthwalo ngaphandle komgibeli, okuyilapho ungena khona.
data.corrected_reference: Indlela elula yokuyingenisa ngokushesha ukuthi uyithumele njengomthwalo ohloliwe. Imithetho yezinkampani zezindiza angeke ibavumele ukuthumela umthwalo ngaphandle komgibeli, okuyilapho ungena khona.

data.translation: Indlela ecacile yokundiza engena ekilasini lokuqala noma lebhizinisi ukuchitha imali eningi ukuze uthole ilungelo (noma, okungcono nakakhulu, wenze inkampani yakho ikwenzele lona)
data.original_reference: Indlela esobala yokugibela egumbini lendiza elibizayo noma labebhizinisi ukukhipha imali eningi yalelo lungelo (noma, okugcono, wenze inkampani yakho ikwenzele lokho).

data.translation: ISingapore ngokuvamile iyindawo ephephile kakhulu futhi kulula ukuzulazula kuyo, futhi ungathenga cishe noma yini lapho ufika.

data.translation: Kodwa uma ubekwe endaweni ephakeme kakhulu ehlathini elishisayo emadolobheni asenyakatho ye-equator uzodinga ukubhekana nokushisa (ngaso sonke isikhathi) nelanga eliqinile (lapho isibhakabhaka sicacile, kuncane kakhulu).
data.original_reference: Uma ubekwe “emazweni aphezulu anokushisa okukhulu” amadigiliyi ambalwa nje enyakatho nenkabazwe kuzodingeka ubhekane nokushisa (njalo) kanye nelanga elishisa kakhulu (lapho libalele, okungavamisanga ukwenzeka).

data.translation: Kusukela kwafika umuntu eGalapagos, kuye kwaziswa izilwane eziningi ezincelisayo ezihlanganisa izimbuzi, amahhashi, izinkomo, amagundane, amakati nezinja.
